Meaning: punctually at 1 o'clock; being exactly on time
Meaning_translated_KR: 정확히 1시에; 제시간에 도착하다

Meaning: used to mean that something will be successful or easy to achieve
Meaning_translated_KR: 무언가가 성공적이거나 달성하기 쉽다는 의미로 사용됨

Meaning: false courage or bravery, often gained from consuming alcohol
Meaning_translated_KR: 거짓 용기 또는 용감함, 종종 알코올을 소비함으로써 얻어지는

Idiom: Hand something to someone on a silver platter
Meaning: to give or provide something to someone very easily or without any effort or struggle on their part
Meaning_translated_KR: 누군가에게 매우 쉽게, 또는 그들의 노력이나 고생 없이 어떤 것을 주거나 제공하다

Meaning: a situation in which you are given no real choice at all
Meaning_translated_KR: 정말로 선택의 여지가 없는 상황

Meaning: an expression of disbelief or doubt, often used when someone makes a statement that seems unlikely or impossible
Meaning_translated_KR: 믿기 어려움이나 의심을 표현하는 말, 종종 누군가가 불가능하거나 믿기 힘든 주장을 할 때 사용됨

Meaning: a period of unusually warm, sunny weather in the autumn or early winter
Meaning_translated_KR: 가을이나 초겨울에 나타나는 비정상적으로 따뜻하고 맑은 날씨의 기간

Meaning: someone with two distinct personalities, one good and one evil
Meaning_translated_KR: 선한 면과 악한 면을 가진 두 가지 뚜렷한 성격을 가진 사람

Meaning: a victory that comes at such a great cost that it is ultimately a loss or defeat
Meaning_translated_KR: 대가가 너무 커서 결국에는 패배나 손실로 귀결되는 승리

Meaning: to have one's desired or deserved position or recognition
Meaning_translated_KR: 자신이 원하는 또는 마땅히 받는 위치나 인정을 얻다

Meaning: to emphasize the authority, importance, or unquestionable nature of something or someone's statement or decision
Meaning_translated_KR: 무언가 또는 누군가의 진술이나 결정을 강조하여 그 권위, 중요성 또는 의심할 여지가 없음을 나타내다.

Meaning: an unfortunate or unfair circumstance or event
Meaning_translated_KR: 불행한 또는 불공정한 상황이나 사건

Meaning: an unpleasant or difficult day; a day when everything seems to go wrong
Meaning_translated_KR: 불쾌하거나 힘든 날; 모든 것이 잘못되는 것처럼 느껴지는 날

Idiom: a bad workman always blames his tools
Meaning: someone who is unable to do their job well will always find an excuse or scapegoat for their own failings
Meaning_translated_KR: 자신의 일을 잘하지 못하는 사람은 항상 자신의 실패에 대한 변명이나 희생양을 찾게 된다.

Meaning: an easy or comfortable situation
Meaning_translated_KR: 쉬운 또는 편안한 상황

Meaning: something that is difficult or demanding to achieve or obtain
Meaning_translated_KR: 달성하거나 얻기 어려운 것이나 힘든 것

Idiom: a bigger bang for your buck
Meaning: getting a greater value, benefit, or outcome in relation to the amount of money or effort invested
Meaning_translated_KR: 투자한 금액이나 노력에 비해 더 큰 가치, 이익 또는 결과를 얻는 것

Idiom: a bird in the hand is worth two in the bush
Meaning: it is better to hold onto something that you have for certain, than to risk losing it by trying to get something better
Meaning_translated_KR: 확실히 가지고 있는 것을 지키는 것이, 더 나은 것을 얻으려고 하다 잃어버릴 위험을 감수하는 것보다 낫다.

Meaning: excessive or unreasonable; more than one can handle or tolerate
Meaning_translated_KR: 과도하거나 비합리적인; 감당하거나 견딜 수 있는 것을 초과하는

Meaning: a person, especially a woman, who is considered to be attractive but not very intelligent or interesting
Meaning_translated_KR: 매력적이지만 그다지 지적이지 않거나 흥미롭지 않은 여성.

Meaning: a small meal or snack; something to eat
Meaning_translated_KR: 가벼운 식사 또는 간식; 먹을 것

Meaning: something that seems bad or unlucky at first, but turns out to be beneficial in the end
Meaning_translated_KR: 처음에는 나쁘거나 불운처럼 보이지만 결국에는 유익한 것으로 드러나는 것

Meaning: something or someone that is refreshing and new, providing a different and positive perspective or experience
Meaning_translated_KR: 신선하고 새로운 것 또는 누구, 다른 긍정적인 관점이나 경험을 제공하는.

Meaning: a couple; a pair
Meaning_translated_KR: 한 쌍; 한 쌍의 사람들

Meaning: a forceful punch or hit with a closed fist
Meaning_translated_KR: 주먹으로 세게 때리기

Idiom: a burnt child dreads the fire
Meaning: someone who has been hurt or had a bad experience is extra cautious to avoid similar situations in the future
Meaning_translated_KR: 상처를 받았거나 나쁜 경험을 한 사람은 미래에 유사한 상황을 피하기 위해 더욱 조심스럽게 행동한다.

Meaning: to have a grudge or to be easily angered or offended
Meaning_translated_KR: 원한을 가지다 또는 쉽게 화를 내거나 기분이 상하다

Meaning: official or formal statement confirming that someone or something is healthy, in good condition, or free from any negative or harmful factors
Meaning_translated_KR: 누군가 또는 무언가가 건강하고, 양호한 상태이며, 부정적이거나 유해한 요소가 없음을 확인하는 공식 또는 공식적인 진술

Meaning: of higher quality or better than average
Meaning_translated_KR: 더 높은 품질이거나 평균보다 나은

Idiom: a diamond in the rough (a.k.a rough diamond )
Meaning: someone or something with potential, but lacking refinement or polish
Meaning_translated_KR: 잠재력이 있지만 다듬어지지 않거나 세련되지 않은 사람이나 사물

Meaning: something that is very common or easy to obtain
Meaning_translated_KR: 아주 흔하거나 쉽게 얻을 수 있는 것

Meaning: a very small or insignificant amount; something of little value or importance
Meaning_translated_KR: 매우 작거나 중요하지 않은 양; 가치나 중요성이 적은 것

Idiom: a dish fit for the gods
Meaning: an exceptionally delicious or impressive dish
Meaning_translated_KR: 특별히 맛있거나 인상 깊은 요리

Meaning: someone who is skeptical or doubtful, particularly in regards to religious matters
Meaning_translated_KR: 특히 종교 문제에 대해 회의적이거나 의심이 많은 사람

Idiom: a drop in the bucket (or ocean)
Meaning: something that is very small or insignificant in comparison to something much larger or more significant
Meaning_translated_KR: 훨씬 더 크거나 중요한 것에 비해 매우 작거나 중요하지 않은 것

Meaning: something that is inevitable or unavoidable; a basic or fundamental truth or reality
Meaning_translated_KR: 피할 수 없거나 피할 수 없는 것; 기본적이거나 근본적인 진리 또는 현실

Meaning: an extremely bad or undesirable outcome or situation
Meaning_translated_KR: 매우 나쁘거나 바람직하지 않은 결과 또는 상황

Meaning: an achievement or accomplishment that one can be proud of
Meaning_translated_KR: 자랑스러운 성취 또는 업적

Meaning: feeling uncomfortable or out of place in a certain situation
Meaning_translated_KR: 특정 상황에서 불편함을 느끼거나 어색함을 느끼다.

Meaning: something or someone that initially shows great promise but fails to meet expectations in the long run
Meaning_translated_KR: 초기에는 큰 잠재력을 보이지만 결국 기대에 미치지 못하는 것 또는 사람

Meaning: something that spoils or ruins a situation or plan
Meaning_translated_KR: 상황이나 계획을 망치거나 엉망으로 만드는 것

Meaning: To be an unnoticed observer; to be able to witness a situation without being noticed
Meaning_translated_KR: 눈에 띄지 않는 관찰자가 되다; 주목받지 않으면서 상황을 목격할 수 있다

Idiom: a fool and his money are soon parted
Meaning: Someone who is foolish with their money will quickly lose it.
Meaning_translated_KR: 돈을 어리석게 쓰는 사람은 금방 잃게 된다.

Meaning: to be in a state of false happiness or satisfaction, often due to ignorance or denial of reality
Meaning_translated_KR: 허위의 행복이나 만족 상태에 놓여 있는 것, 종종 무지 또는 현실 부정으로 인한 상태

Meaning: to have a small opportunity or opening that could lead to further success or advancement
Meaning_translated_KR: 작은 기회나 가능성이 있어 더 나아갈 수 있는 길을 열어주는 것

Idiom: a golden key can open any door
Meaning: having the right or influential connections can help you achieve success or gain access to opportunities
Meaning_translated_KR: 올바른 또는 영향력 있는 인맥을 갖는 것은 성공을 달성하거나 기회에 접근하는 데 도움이 될 수 있다.

Meaning: an extremely narrow margin or very close distance
Meaning_translated_KR: 매우 좁은 간격이나 아주 가까운 거리

Meaning: a controversial or sensitive issue that is difficult to handle or solve
Meaning_translated_KR: 다루기 어렵거나 해결하기 힘든 논란의 여지가 있는 민감한 문제

Idiom: a house divided against itself cannot stand
Meaning: internal conflict within a group or organization will lead to its downfall
Meaning_translated_KR: 그룹이나 조직 내의 내부 갈등은 그들의 몰락으로 이어질 것이다.

Meaning: a person who comes to someone's aid or rescue; a heroic or chivalrous person
Meaning_translated_KR: 누군가를 돕거나 구해주는 사람; 영웅적이거나 기사도적인 사람

Idiom: a leopard can't change his spots
Meaning: Someone cannot change their basic nature or character.
Meaning_translated_KR: 누구나 자신의 기본적인 본성이나 성격을 바꿀 수는 없다.

Meaning: someone or something that saves or rescues someone in a difficult or dangerous situation
Meaning_translated_KR: 어떤 어려운 상황이나 위험한 상황에서 누군가를 구하거나 구하는 사람이나 것

Meaning: to have learned or obtained information from an unknown or secret source
Meaning_translated_KR: 알 수 없거나 비밀스러운 출처에서 정보를 배웠거나 얻었다.

Idiom: a little learning is a dangerous thing
Meaning: having a small amount of knowledge about something can lead to overconfidence and mistakes
Meaning_translated_KR: 어떤 것에 대한 지식이 조금만 있으면 과신과 실수로 이어질 수 있다.

Meaning: nonsense or rubbish; something that is not believable or of poor quality
Meaning_translated_KR: 무의미한 이야기나 쓸모없는 것; 믿을 수 없거나 품질이 낮은 것

Meaning: nonsense or something that is completely untrue or unbelievable
Meaning_translated_KR: 터무니없는 말이나 전혀 사실이 아니거나 믿기 어려운 것

Idiom: a lost ball in the weeds
Meaning: to be in a difficult or hopeless situation with little chance of success or rescue
Meaning_translated_KR: 성공이나 구조의 가능성이 거의 없는 어려운 또는 절망적인 상황에 처하다

Meaning: having many tasks or responsibilities to deal with
Meaning_translated_KR: 많은 업무나 책임을 처리해야 하는

Meaning: Having a lot of tasks or responsibilities to deal with
Meaning_translated_KR: 많은 업무나 책임을 처리해야 하는 상태

Idiom: a man after my own heart
Meaning: someone who has the same attitudes, preferences, or interests as oneself
Meaning_translated_KR: 자신과 같은 태도, 선호, 또는 관심사를 가진 사람

Meaning: Someone who takes decisive and immediate action, rather than just talking or planning
Meaning_translated_KR: 결정적이고 즉각적인 행동을 취하는 사람, 단순히 말하거나 계획하는 것이 아니라

Meaning: someone who does not talk much, someone who is not very talkative
Meaning_translated_KR: 말이 많지 않은 사람, 말이 적은 사람

Meaning: to describe a man who is strong, tough, and exhibits stereotypically masculine qualities
Meaning_translated_KR: 강하고 단단하며 전형적인 남성적 특성을 지닌 남자를 설명하다

Idiom: a miss is as good as a mile
Meaning: Even a small mistake or failure has the same result as a larger one; being close to success or achieving a goal is not the same as actually succeeding.
Meaning_translated_KR: 작은 실수나 실패도 큰 실수와 같은 결과를 가져오며, 성공에 가까워지거나 목표를 달성하는 것과 실제로 성공하는 것은 다르다.

Meaning: something that is very difficult or impossible to find or locate
Meaning_translated_KR: 찾거나 찾는 것이 매우 어렵거나 불가능한 것

Meaning: renewed energy, vitality, or enthusiasm
Meaning_translated_KR: 새로운 에너지, 활력 또는 열정

Meaning: a person who performs a lot of numerical calculations or data analysis
Meaning_translated_KR: 많은 수치 계산이나 데이터 분석을 수행하는 사람

Meaning: an expression used to ask someone what they are thinking about or to invite them to share their thoughts or opinions
Meaning_translated_KR: 무슨 생각을 하고 있는지 물어보거나 그들의 생각이나 의견을 나누도록 초대하는 표현

Idiom: a penny saved is a penny earned
Meaning: Saving money is the same as earning money; it is wise to save money.
Meaning_translated_KR: 돈을 절약하는 것은 돈을 버는 것과 같다; 돈을 저축하는 것은 현명한 일이다.

Meaning: a situation in which a combination of factors come together to create a very difficult or dangerous problem
Meaning_translated_KR: 여러 요인이 결합하여 매우 어렵거나 위험한 문제를 야기하는 상황

Meaning: An image or visual representation can convey a message or meaning more effectively than words can.
Meaning_translated_KR: 이미지나 시각적 표현은 말보다 메시지나 의미를 더 효과적으로 전달할 수 있다.

Idiom: a picture is worth a thousand words
Meaning: An image can convey a complex idea or emotion more effectively than a written description.
Meaning_translated_KR: 이미지는 글로 설명하는 것보다 복잡한 아이디어나 감정을 더 효과적으로 전달할 수 있다.

Idiom: a picture paints a thousand words
Meaning: Visual imagery is often more powerful or effective in conveying a message or expressing a concept than words alone.
Meaning_translated_KR: 시각적 이미지는 종종 단어만으로 전달하는 것보다 메시지를 전달하거나 개념을 표현하는 데 더 강력하거나 효과적입니다.

Meaning: something that is very easy to do or accomplish
Meaning_translated_KR: 매우 쉽고 간단한 것

Meaning: buying something without inspecting it first
Meaning_translated_KR: 먼저 검사하지 않고 물건을 사는 것

Meaning: having a comfortable or favorable position; a situation where one is prosperous or content
Meaning_translated_KR: 편안하거나 유리한 위치에 있는; 번영하거나 만족하는 상황

Meaning: to cost a large amount of money
Meaning_translated_KR: 많은 돈이 들다

Meaning: something that indicates a potential danger or warning sign
Meaning_translated_KR: 잠재적 위험이나 경고 신호를 나타내는 것

Idiom: a red rag to a bull
Meaning: something that is certain to provoke or irritate someone
Meaning_translated_KR: 누군가를 확실히 자극하거나 짜증나게 하는 것

Meaning: having a place to live; having basic shelter and protection
Meaning_translated_KR: 거주할 장소가 있는 것; 기본적인 쉼터와 보호가 있는 것

Meaning: someone who can be relied upon to do a task or handle a situation competently and responsibly
Meaning_translated_KR: 믿고 맡길 수 있는, 작업을 잘 수행하거나 상황을 책임감 있게 처리할 수 있는 사람

Meaning: a profound or significant transformation or change
Meaning_translated_KR: 심오하거나 중요한 변화

Meaning: a boost or stimulus; something that rejuvenates or revitalizes
Meaning_translated_KR: 증진이나 자극; 활기를 불어넣거나 회복시키는 것

Meaning: something or someone that is very pleasing, comforting, or refreshing to see
Meaning_translated_KR: 보기만 해도 매우 기쁘거나 편안하게 하거나 상쾌한 것 또는 누군가

Idiom: a skeleton in the closet (or cupboard)
Meaning: an embarrassing or shameful secret that someone keeps hidden from others
Meaning_translated_KR: 다른 사람에게 숨기는 민망하거나 부끄러운 비밀

Meaning: a mild or lenient punishment or reprimand
Meaning_translated_KR: 경미한 처벌이나 경고

Idiom: a sledgehammer to crack a nut
Meaning: using excessive force or taking extreme measures to solve a relatively small problem
Meaning_translated_KR: 상대적으로 작은 문제를 해결하기 위해 과도한 힘을 사용하거나 극단적인 조치를 취하다.

Meaning: The situation where an initial action or event leads to a series of increasingly significant consequences or reactions.
Meaning_translated_KR: 초기 행동이나 사건이 점점 더 중요한 결과나 반응으로 이어지는 상황.

Meaning: almost no chance at all
Meaning_translated_KR: 거의 전혀 기회가 없음

Meaning: something or someone that is sad, pitiful, or pathetic to look at
Meaning_translated_KR: 슬프거나 불쌍하거나 가련해 보이는 것 또는 사람

Meaning: an exceptionally good deal; something that is obtained or purchased at a very low price
Meaning_translated_KR: 특히 좋은 거래; 아주 낮은 가격에 얻거나 구매한 것

Idiom: a stitch in time saves nine
Meaning: Taking prompt action to solve a problem or address an issue can prevent greater problems or issues in the future.
Meaning_translated_KR: 문제를 해결하거나 이슈를 다루기 위해 신속하게 행동하는 것은 미래에 더 큰 문제나 이슈를 예방할 수 있습니다.

Meaning: a short distance away; within close proximity
Meaning_translated_KR: 짧은 거리 떨어진 곳에; 가까운 거리에서

Meaning: an overreaction to a small or insignificant issue
Meaning_translated_KR: 사소한 문제에 대한 지나친 반응

Idiom: a taste (or dose) of your own medicine
Meaning: experiencing the same negative treatment or action that one has given to others
Meaning_translated_KR: 자신이 다른 사람에게 행한 것과 동일한 부정적인 대우나 행동을 경험하다

Meaning: someone or something that causes constant annoyance, frustration, or difficulty
Meaning_translated_KR: 지속적인 짜증, 좌절 또는 어려움을 유발하는 사람이나 사물

Meaning: an uncertain or unpredictable outcome; a situation in which the result is unclear or equally likely
Meaning_translated_KR: 불확실하거나 예측할 수 없는 결과; 결과가 불분명하거나 동등하게 가능성이 있는 상황

Idiom: a voice crying in the wilderness
Meaning: someone who is expressing an unpopular or ignored opinion or viewpoint
Meaning_translated_KR: 주목받지 않거나 무시된 의견이나 관점을 표현하는 사람

Meaning: when you are waiting for something to happen, it seems to take a very long time
Meaning_translated_KR: 무언가가 일어나기를 기다릴 때, 그것이 매우 오랜 시간이 걸리는 것처럼 느껴진다.

Meaning: a completely different situation or set of circumstances, often more challenging or complex than before
Meaning_translated_KR: 전혀 다른 상황이나 상황의 집합, 종종 이전보다 더 도전적이거나 복잡한 경우

Meaning: someone who appears harmless or friendly but is actually dangerous or deceitful

Meaning: someone who speaks very little or is not talkative

Idiom: about as useful as a chocolate teapot
Meaning: completely useless or ineffective

Meaning: to completely change one's opinion, attitude, or direction

Meaning: "finally" or "long overdue"

Meaning: open, honest, and transparent; without deceit or hidden agendas

Meaning: better or higher quality than average or expected

Meaning: immune to suspicion or doubt

Meaning: exempt from the rules or laws that apply to others
Meaning_translated_KR: 다른 사람들에게 적용되는 규칙이나 법에서 면제된

Meaning: to be of high rank or social standing

Idiom: absence makes the heart grow fonder
Meaning: the feeling of affection or longing for someone or something increases when they are absent or distant
Meaning_translated_KR: 누군가 또는 무언가가 없거나 멀어질 때 애정이나 그리움의 감정이 증가한다.

Meaning: absolutely; definitely; without a doubt

Meaning: doing something intentionally but making it seem like an accident

Meaning: to provide an explanation or answer for something

Meaning: a secret advantage or resource that can be used in a situation when it is needed

Meaning: the vulnerable or weak point of someone or something

Meaning: a weakness or vulnerable point

Meaning: feeling deep sadness or longing

Meaning: a definitive and conclusive test to determine the true nature or quality of something

Meaning: applying to everyone or everything; affecting all aspects or areas
Meaning_translated_KR: 모든 사람이나 모든 것에 적용되는; 모든 측면이나 분야에 영향을 미치는

Meaning: to behave in a manner that is appropriate for someone of a certain age

Meaning: an event or occurrence that is beyond human control, often used to refer to a natural disaster or other catastrophic event

Meaning: an unpredictable event or natural disaster that causes significant damage or loss

Meaning: to behave in a manner that is appropriate for someone of a certain age or maturity level

Meaning: to behave in a mature and responsible manner appropriate for one's age

Meaning: "water" (referring to water as a simple and pure drink)
Meaning_translated_KR: "물" (간단하고 순수한 음료로서의 물)

Meaning: To make a situation worse by aggravating or intensifying it

Idiom: add fuel to the fire (or flames)

Meaning: to make a bad situation worse
Meaning_translated_KR: 나쁜 상황을 더 악화시키다

Meaning: a natural liking or attraction towards something or someone

Meaning: attempting to complete or achieve something before a deadline or time constraint
Meaning_translated_KR: 기한이나 시간 제약 전에 무언가를 완료하거나 성취하려고 시도하는 것

Meaning: to show respect for elders or allow them to go ahead in a certain situation, often with a touch of humor
Meaning_translated_KR: 어르신을 존중하며 특정 상황에서 그들이 먼저 가도록 배려하다, 종종 유머를 곁들여서.

Meaning: to reach the age at which one is no longer eligible or required to participate in something

Meaning: to be innovative or revolutionary in relation to a particular period or era

Meaning: to be more advanced or innovatiive than others; to have ideas or beliefs that are ahead of their time

Meaning: being ahead or more advanced than others in terms of knowledge, skills, or trends
Meaning_translated_KR: 지식, 기술 또는 트렌드 면에서 다른 사람들보다 앞서거나 더 발전된 상태

Meaning: being in a favorable or advantageous position; being prepared or ahead in a particular situation

Meaning: experienced; not easily fooled or taken advantage of

Meaning: Refers to eating lunch at one's desk, typically in a work or office setting

Meaning: "outdoors" or "in the open air"
Meaning_translated_KR: "야외" 또는 "신선한 공기 속에서"

Meaning: still alive and healthy; active and energetic

Meaning: something that is difficult or impossible to understand or comprehend

Meaning: from the beginning; throughout the entire duration of something; at every stage or moment

Meaning: everyone, without exception

Meaning: to be confused or disoriented

Meaning: someone who talks tough or acts aggressively, but lacks the courage or ability to follow through with their threats or actions

Meaning: for the entire duration of the day

Meaning: eager to listen or hear something

Meaning: someone who talks boastfully or confidently about their abilities or accomplishments, but has no substance or evidence to support their claims

Meaning: chaos or extreme disorder ensued

Meaning: something that is expected or typical; a task or situation that is a normal part of one's job or responsibilities

Meaning: considering everything, overall, in summary

Meaning: unorganized or lacking focus; scattered

Meaning: Ready or prepared for something

Meaning: and everything else of a similar nature or kind; and so on; and so forth

Meaning: even more; to a greater extent

Meaning: extremely popular or fashionable

Meaning: completely or fully; without any limitations or reservations

Meaning: assuming that all conditions are the same; in a fair and unbiased situation
Meaning_translated_KR: 모든 조건이 동일하다고 가정할 때; 공정하고 편견 없는 상황에서

Meaning: to be clumsy or awkward with one's hands
Meaning_translated_KR: 손재주가 없거나 서투르다

Meaning: confused, disorganized, or in a state of chaos
Meaning_translated_KR: 혼란스러운, 정리되지 않은, 또는 혼란 상태에 있는

Meaning: to do something simultaneously or in unison
Meaning_translated_KR: 동시에 또는 일제히 무언가를 하다

Meaning: people from all different backgrounds and social statuses

Meaning: completely wrong or mistaken

Idiom: all work and no play makes Jack a dull boy
Meaning: to imply that without time for leisure or recreation, a person becomes boring or uninteresting
Meaning_translated_KR: 여가나 오락을 위한 시간이 없으면 한 사람이 지루하거나 흥미롭지 않게 된다는 것을 암시하다.

Idiom: all's fair in love and war
Meaning: It is acceptable to use any means necessary to achieve one's goals, especially in situations involving strong emotions or conflict.
Meaning_translated_KR: 강한 감정이나 갈등이 있는 상황에서는 목표를 달성하기 위해 어떤 수단이든 사용하는 것이 용납된다.

Meaning: a person who leads a wild, carefree, and often promiscuous lifestyle

Meaning: approximately or around a particular time or period

Meaning: similar or in a similar manner

Meaning: an assertive, dominant, or controlling mother who takes charge of her family and is highly involved in her children's lives
Meaning_translated_KR: 가족을 이끌고 자녀의 삶에 깊이 관여하며 assertive하고 dominant하거나 controlling한 어머니

Meaning: the beginning and the end; the most important or essential part; the entirety or completion of something
Meaning_translated_KR: 시작과 끝; 가장 중요하거나 본질적인 부분; 어떤 것의 전체나 완성

Meaning: a situation or organization in which there are too many acronyms or initials used, making it difficult to understand or navigate

Meaning: continuously pursuing something that is unlikely to be achieved
Meaning_translated_KR: 이루어질 가능성이 낮은 것을 계속 추구하다

Meaning: beer
Meaning_translated_KR: 맥주

Meaning: to be extremely excited or energetic
Meaning_translated_KR: 매우 흥분하거나 에너지가 넘치다

Idiom: an Englishman's home is his castle
Meaning: one's home is a private and protected space where they have control and authority
Meaning_translated_KR: 자신의 집은 개인적이고 보호받는 공간으로, 그들이 통제와 권한을 갖고 있는 곳이다.

Meaning: an event or occurrence that is beyond human control or influence
Meaning_translated_KR: 인간의 통제나 영향을 초과하는 사건이나 발생

Meaning: an aggressive action, typically involving physical force, that is considered a provocation or cause for conflict
Meaning_translated_KR: 갈등을 유발하거나 도발로 간주되는 공격적인 행동, 일반적으로 물리적 힘을 수반하는 행동

Idiom: an apple a day keeps the doctor away
Meaning: Regular consumption of healthy habits can help maintain good health and prevent illnesses.
Meaning_translated_KR: 건강한 습관을 정기적으로 실천하는 것은 좋은 건강을 유지하고 질병을 예방하는 데 도움이 될 수 있습니다.

Meaning: an exorbitant or excessively high price
Meaning_translated_KR: 터무니없이 비싼 가격

Meaning: to have a hidden personal agenda or ulterior motive
Meaning_translated_KR: 숨겨진 개인적인 의도나 숨은 목적이 있다

Meaning: retributive justice; the idea of punishment or revenge in which the punishment corresponds in degree and kind to the offense
Meaning_translated_KR: 응보적 정의; 범죄와 응보가 정도와 종류에 따라 일치하는 처벌 또는 복수의 개념

Meaning: an unspecified or non-specific thing or object
Meaning_translated_KR: 불특정하거나 비특정적인 것이나 물체

Meaning: an old love interest or former romantic partner
Meaning_translated_KR: 옛 사랑이나 이전의 연인

Meaning: a situation or legal matter that is easily and clearly resolved or determined
Meaning_translated_KR: 쉽고 명확하게 해결되거나 결정되는 상황이나 법적 문제

Idiom: an ounce of prevention is worth a pound of cure
Meaning: It is better to take precautions in advance to prevent a problem, rather than trying to resolve it later.
Meaning_translated_KR: 문제를 나중에 해결하려고 하기보다는 미리 예방 조치를 취하는 것이 더 좋다.

Meaning: someone or something that initially appears unattractive or unimpressive but later develops into something beautiful or impressive
Meaning_translated_KR: 처음에는 매력 없거나 인상적이지 않게 보이지만 나중에 아름답거나 인상적으로 발전하는 사람 또는 사물

Meaning: and similar things; and other similar things
Meaning_translated_KR: 그리고 비슷한 것들; 그리고 다른 비슷한 것들

Meaning: continuing in the same manner; et cetera; and so forth

Meaning: To make a mess of someone or something; to confuse or complicate a situation

Meaning: a person, typically a woman, who is difficult, demanding, or hard to please

Meaning: A small or financially unstable country, typically in a tropical or subtropical region, that is politically unstable and dependent on a single export, usually a fruit or agricultural product.

Meaning: Something that is considered to be excellent or exceptional; the best or most innovative thing

Meaning: to be absolutely certain or confident about something

Meaning: refers to a person's spouse or partner

Meaning: to be in a more advantageous or preferable position; to be in a better situation

Idiom: between the devil and the deep blue sea

Meaning: referring to the time period between two major conflicts or wars

Meaning: unacceptable; outside the bounds of what is considered appropriate or reasonable

Meaning: Family bonds are stronger than other social relationships

Meaning: making false or exaggerated statements; trying to deceive or impress others with empty words

Meaning: to refer to the nobility or aristocracy; someone of high social standing or pedigree

Meaning: everything will be fine or everything is settled

Meaning_translated_KR: 규칙이나 절차를 정확하게 따르다; 정해진 지침을 엄격하게 준수하다

Meaning: "incidentally" or "by the way"
Meaning_translated_KR: "그런데" or "우연히"

Meaning: with the help or blessings of God; through divine intervention or favor
Meaning_translated_KR: 하나님의 도움이나 축복으로; 신의 개입이나 은총을 통해

Meaning: "called" or "known as"
Meaning_translated_KR: "이라고 불리는" 또는 "로 알려진"

Meaning: to do something in a predictable and methodical way, without any creativity or originality
Meaning_translated_KR: 예측 가능하고 체계적인 방식으로, 창의성이나 독창성 없이 무언가를 하다

Meaning: to indicate that the same logic or reasoning applies to a similar situation or point
Meaning_translated_KR: 유사한 상황이나 지점에도 동일한 논리나 추론이 적용된다고 나타내다

Idiom: by the seat of your pants
Meaning: to do something by instinct or without a plan; to improvise or make decisions as you go along, often based on intuition rather than careful thought
Meaning_translated_KR: 본능적으로 또는 계획 없이 무언가를 하다; 즉흥적으로 하거나, 신중한 생각이 아닌 직관에 따라 결정을 하다.

Idiom: by the skin of one's teeth
Meaning: narrowly; just barely; with a very small margin of success
Meaning_translated_KR: 아슬아슬하게; 간신히; 매우 작은 차이로 성공하다

Idiom: by the skin of your teeth
Meaning: barely or narrowly escaping a difficult or dangerous situation
Meaning_translated_KR: 어렵거나 위험한 상황에서 간신히 탈출하다

Meaning: incidentally; as an aside; adding information or making a point that is unrelated or not directly connected to the main topic of conversation
Meaning_translated_KR: 덧붙여 말하자면; 부수적으로; 대화의 주요 주제와 직접적으로 관련이 없거나 연결되지 않은 정보를 추가하거나 요점을 만드는 것

Meaning: referring to a life of indulgence, pleasure, and ease; a carefree and enjoyable existence
Meaning_translated_KR: 방종과 쾌락, 안락한 삶을 언급하며; 걱정 없이 즐기는 존재

Meaning: a period of twelve months beginning from the first of January and ending on the thirty-first of December
Meaning_translated_KR: 1월 1일부터 12월 31일까지의 12개월 기간

Meaning: to insult or criticize someone by using offensive or derogatory language
Meaning_translated_KR: 모욕적이거나 경멸적인 언어를 사용하여 누군가를 비 insult하거나 비판하다

Meaning: to be in control and make the decisions

Meaning: to be in control or have authority over a situation or a group of people
Meaning_translated_KR: 상황이나 사람들 그룹을 통제하거나 권한을 가지다

Meaning: to speak honestly and directly, even if it may be considered blunt or offensive
Meaning_translated_KR: 솔직하고 직접적으로 말하다, 비록 그것이 무례하거나 공격적으로 여겨질 수 있더라도.

Meaning: to cease or stop an activity, usually for the remainder of the day
Meaning_translated_KR: 활동을 중단하거나 멈추다, 보통 하루 나머지 동안

Meaning: to agree to stop or end something

Meaning: to insult or verbally abuse someone by using offensive or derogatory language
Meaning_translated_KR: 모욕적이거나 경멸적인 언어를 사용하여 누군가를 모욕하거나 언어적으로 괴롭히다

Meaning: an inherent and instinctive desire or longing for freedom, adventure, or the untamed
Meaning_translated_KR: 자유, 모험 또는 미개척에 대한 본능적이고 타고난 욕구 또는 갈망

Meaning: to stop pursuing or attacking someone; to end or cancel a search, investigation, or aggressive behavior towards someone or something

Meaning: to be reprimanded or called out for something
Meaning_translated_KR: 무언가에 대해 꾸중을 듣거나 지적받다

Meaning: to insult or verbally abuse someone
Meaning_translated_KR: 누군가를 모욕하거나 언어적으로 학대하다

Meaning: to challenge someone to prove or reveal the truth of their claims, often by exposing their deception or false bravado
Meaning_translated_KR: 누군가의 주장의 진실을 증명하거나 드러내도록 도전하다, 종종 그들의 기만이나 거짓 겉모습을 폭로함으로써.

Meaning: having control or being in charge
Meaning_translated_KR: 통제하거나 책임이 있는 상태

Meaning: to be in control or have authority over a situation
Meaning_translated_KR: 상황을 지배하거나 통제하다

Meaning: the peaceful period right before a chaotic or challenging situation
Meaning_translated_KR: 혼란스럽거나 어려운 상황 바로 직전에 있는 평화로운 시기

Meaning: someone who associates with a group for personal gain or benefits, often without making a significant contribution
Meaning_translated_KR: 개인적인 이익이나 혜택을 위해 그룹과 연관되지만, 종종 큰 기여를 하지 않는 사람

Meaning: a complicated, difficult, or contentious situation or problem that is more troublesome than it appears initially
Meaning_translated_KR: 처음에 보이는 것보다 더 골치 아프고 복잡하며 어려운 상황이나 문제

Meaning: to not meet expectations or perform adequately; to be unable to do a task or meet standards
Meaning_translated_KR: 기대에 미치지 못하다; 적절하게 수행하지 못하다; 과제를 수행하거나 기준을 충족하지 못하다

Meaning: strongly dislike or be unable to tolerate someone or something
Meaning_translated_KR: 누군가 또는 무언가를 강하게 싫어하거나 견딜 수 없다.

Meaning: to dislike or have an aversion to someone or something
Meaning_translated_KR: 누군가나 무언가를 싫어하거나 반감이 있다

Meaning: an exclusive and often negative culture or social environment within a workplace or organization, characterized by a lack of diversity, closed-mindedness, and resistance to change
Meaning_translated_KR: 직장이나 조직 내에서 독점적이고 종종 부정적인 문화 또는 사회적 환경으로, 다양성 부족, 폐쇄적인 사고방식, 변화에 대한 저항이 특징입니다.

Meaning: strongly dislike or cannot tolerate
Meaning_translated_KR: 몹시 싫어하다 또는 참을 수 없다

Meaning: to approach someone humbly or in a subordinate manner, often asking for a favor or forgiveness

Meaning: referring to someone who states the obvious or points out something that is already widely known or evident
Meaning_translated_KR: 명백한 것을 말하거나 이미 널리 알려지거나 분명한 것을 지적하는 사람을 가리킴

Meaning: the amount of greenhouse gases (carbon dioxide, methane, etc.) that an individual, organization, or activity is responsible for producing, particularly in relation to the environment and climate change

Meaning: seize the day; enjoy the present without worrying about the future

Meaning: a combination of rewards and punishments used as a motivation or incentive to encourage desired behavior

Meaning: to have strong feelings of love or affection for someone, especially when those feelings are not reciprocated
Meaning_translated_KR: 특히 그 감정이 reciprocated되지 않을 때, 누군가에게 강한 사랑이나 애정을 느끼다.

Meaning: to be able to sing or hold a melody

Meaning: to continue, proceed, or persist with an activity or task

Meaning: to take responsibility for completing a task or achieving a goal
Meaning_translated_KR: 작업을 완료하거나 목표를 달성하는 책임을 맡다

Meaning: To take the blame or responsibility for something, especially on behalf of others
Meaning_translated_KR: 다른 사람을 대신하여 어떤 일에 대한 책임이나 비난을 떠맡다

Meaning: to be successful or victorious; to have the desired outcome or result

Meaning: complete freedom or authority to act as one wishes

Meaning: an example that proves or supports a point or argument

Meaning: considering each individual situation separately, rather than applying a general rule or approach

Meaning: a source of consistent and reliable profit or income

Meaning: to take advantage of a situation for personal gain or profit

Meaning: an ability to tolerate or digest something that would normally cause discomfort or illness

Meaning: to offer something valuable or precious to someone who does not appreciate or understand its worth
Meaning_translated_KR: 가치나 소중함을 이해하지 못하는 사람에게 귀한 것을 제공하다

Meaning: to be judgmental or critical of others, usually without considering one's own faults or mistakes
Meaning_translated_KR: 다른 사람을 판단하거나 비판하는 경향이 있으며, 보통 자신의 결점이나 실수를 고려하지 않는 것

Meaning: to think back or remember something

Meaning: to have unrealistic or impractical dreams or plans

Meaning: a burglar who is skilled in entering and leaving a building without being noticed or leaving any evidence behind
Meaning_translated_KR: 눈에 띄지 않거나 증거를 남기지 않고 건물에 침입하고 빠져나가는 데 능숙한 도둑

Meaning: to be unable to speak or respond, often due to surprise or embarrassment
Meaning_translated_KR: 놀람이나 부끄러움으로 인해 말이나 반응을 할 수 없는 상태

Meaning: unable or unwilling to speak

Meaning: to attract one's attention or interest

Meaning: to become sick with a cold
Meaning_translated_KR: 감기에 걸리다

Meaning: attract attention or be noticed
Meaning_translated_KR: 주목을 끌다 또는 눈에 띄다

Meaning: to become popular or widely accepted

Meaning: to catch someone off guard or unprepared
Meaning_translated_KR: 누군가를 불시착하다 или 준비되지 않은 상태에서 잡다.

Meaning: to attract someone's attention or be noticed by someone

Meaning: to get a suntan or become sunburnt

Meaning: to reach or achieve the same level or position as someone or something that was previously ahead; to meet with someone to get updated or to socialize
Meaning_translated_KR: 누군가 또는 무엇인가에 비해 이전에 앞서 있었던 것과 같은 수준이나 위치에 도달하다; 누군가와 만나서 업데이트를 받거나 사교를 하다

Meaning: short, light sleep; a brief period of rest or relaxation
Meaning_translated_KR: 짧고 가벼운 수면; 짧은 휴식 또는 이완의 기간

Meaning: Unable to decide between two alternatives or feeling uncertain about a situation.
Meaning_translated_KR: 두 가지 대안 사이에서 결정하지 못하거나 상황에 대해 불확실한 느낌.

Idiom: caught by the short hairs (or short and curlies)
Meaning: to be in a difficult or vulnerable position, with no easy way out
Meaning_translated_KR: 어렵거나 취약한 상황에 처해 있으며, 쉽게 빠져나갈 방법이 없는 상태에 있다.

Meaning: stuck or trapped in a place or situation that seems to be from a different era or time period

Meaning: being involved in a conflict or disagreement between two or more parties, often resulting in being unfairly blamed or affected
Meaning_translated_KR: 두 개 이상의 당사자 간의 갈등이나 disagreement에 연루되어, 종종 불공정하게 비난받거나 영향을 받는 것.

Meaning: to yield or give in to pressure, demands, or persuasion
Meaning_translated_KR: 압력, 요구, 또는 설득에 굴복하다

Meaning: a long, upholstered seat with a back and armrests, on which a person can recline or sit
Meaning_translated_KR: 등받이와 팔걸이가 있는 긴 충전 가구로, 사람이 기대거나 앉을 수 있는 자리

Meaning: to attribute something to a lack of experience or knowledge

Meaning: to be impatient or eager to start or do something

Meaning: to pass from one owner or holder to another
Meaning_translated_KR: 한 주인이나 소유자에서 다른 주인이나 소유자로 넘어가다

Meaning: a significant shift in attitude or opinion
Meaning_translated_KR: 태도 또는 의견의 중대한 변화

Meaning: to completely change one's opinion, attitude, or behavior, typically in a more favorable or accommodating way
Meaning_translated_KR: 자신의 의견, 태도 또는 행동을 완전히 바꾸다, 일반적으로 더 호의적이거나 수용적인 방식으로

Meaning: to provide specific and detailed information or evidence
Meaning_translated_KR: 구체적이고 상세한 정보나 증거를 제공하다

Meaning: Taking care of one's own family and loved ones should be a priority before helping others.
Meaning_translated_KR: 자신의 가족과 사랑하는 사람들을 돌보는 것이 다른 사람들을 도와주기 전에 우선시되어야 합니다.

Meaning: a painful muscular cramp, typically in the leg, often resulting from overexertion or dehydration
Meaning_translated_KR: 통증이 있는 근육 경련, 일반적으로 다리에서 발생하며, 과도한 운동이나 탈수로 인해 자주 발생합니다.

Meaning: to have an unusually lucky or fortunate life
Meaning_translated_KR: 비정상적으로 운이 좋거나 행운이 가득한 삶을 살다

Meaning: to pursue unrealistic or impossible goals or dreams
Meaning_translated_KR: 비현실적이거나 불가능한 목표나 꿈을 추구하다

Meaning: to engage in a repetitive or futile task, often without making any progress
Meaning_translated_KR: 반복적이거나 헛된 작업에 참여하다, 종종 진전을 이루지 못하면서

Meaning: to pursue or pursue multiple romantic or sexual partners, often in a casual or noncommittal manner
Meaning_translated_KR: 여러 연애 또는 성적 파트너를 추구하거나, 흔히 캐주얼하거나 비유동적인 방식으로 접근하다

Meaning: written material used for cheating on a test or exam
Meaning_translated_KR: 시험이나 테스트에서 부정행위를 위해 사용되는 서면 자료

Meaning: very close together; in close proximity
Meaning_translated_KR: 아주 가까이; 근접하여

Meaning: ripe or fully matured; in perfect condition or at the peak of quality
Meaning_translated_KR: 익거나 완전히 성숙한; 완벽한 상태이거나 최고의 품질에 있는

Meaning: to repeatedly think or discuss something, usually in a critical or judgmental manner
Meaning_translated_KR: 어떤 것에 대해 반복적으로 생각하거나 논의하다, 보통 비판적이거나 판단적인 방식으로

Meaning: to have a casual and leisurely conversation or discussion, often about trivial matters
Meaning_translated_KR: 가벼운 잡담을 하다; 사소한 일에 대해 여유롭게 대화하다

Meaning: to scold or reprimand someone severely
Meaning_translated_KR: 누군가를 심하게 꾸짖다 또는 질책하다

Meaning: to think or ponder over something; to reflect or contemplate on a topic or issue
Meaning_translated_KR: 어떤 것에 대해 생각하거나 깊이 고민하다; 주제나 문제를 성찰하거나 숙고하다

Meaning: to chat or have a casual conversation
Meaning_translated_KR: 잡담하다; 가벼운 대화를 나누다

Meaning: to be fearful, easily scared, or lacking courage
Meaning_translated_KR: 겁이 많다, 쉽게 무섭거나 용기가 없다.

Meaning: insignificant amount of money; a small or paltry sum of money
Meaning_translated_KR: 미미한 금액; 적은 또는 보잘것없는 금액

Meaning: to decide not to do something out of fear or lack of courage
Meaning_translated_KR: 두려움이나 용기의 부족으로 인해 무언가를 하지 않기로 결정하다

Meaning: easily frightened or lacking courage; timid or cowardly
Meaning_translated_KR: 쉽게 겁을 내거나 용기가 부족한; 소심하거나 비겁한

Meaning: consequences or negative actions will eventually catch up to a person
Meaning_translated_KR: 결과나 부정적인 행동은 결국 그 사람에게 돌아온다.

Meaning: something that is very easy or simple
Meaning_translated_KR: 아주 쉽거나 간단한 것

Idiom: children should be seen and not heard
Meaning: children should be quiet and not speak unless spoken to
Meaning_translated_KR: 아이들은 조용히 해야 하며, 말을 걸지 않으면 말하지 않아야 한다.

Meaning: to calm down or relax, especially when someone is overreacting or being overly uptight
Meaning_translated_KR: 진정하다 또는 휴식을 취하다, 특히 누군가가 과민 반응을 보이거나 지나치게 긴장할 때

Meaning: to feel extremely cold
Meaning_translated_KR: 굉장히 추위를 느끼다

Meaning: to be extremely cold or frightened

Meaning: to join in a conversation or discussion, often interrupting or adding one's opinion or input

Meaning: a term of endearment, similar to 'my dear' or 'son'

Meaning: completely clean or pure

Meaning: to get rid of or eliminate something or someone completely or thoroughly

Meaning: not clear or easy to understand

Meaning: To resolve or clarify a tense or confusing situation; to address and eliminate any misunderstandings or conflicts

Meaning: Someone who assumes an air of superiority or dominance; someone who struts or boasts about their accomplishments or position.

Idiom: come down on somebody like a ton of bricks

Meaning: to suddenly appear or emerge, often in large numbers or from unexpected places

Meaning: to become more outgoing or sociable, to overcome shyness or reserve

Meaning: regardless of any circumstances or obstacles; in any weather condition

Meaning: to be remembered or thought of

Meaning: to produce or provide something, especially an idea or solution

Meaning: the euphemistic term used to refer to women who were forced into sexual slavery by the Japanese military during World War II

Meaning: very familiar or unremarkable; someone or something that is widely known and easily recognized

Meaning: someone who is fiercely loyal to their employer and will always prioritize the interests of the company

Meaning_translated_KR: 근본적으로 다르고 비교하거나 대조할 수 없는 두 가지를 비교하다

Meaning: someone who deceives or tricks others for personal gain

Meaning_translated_KR: 독신 남자; 결혼할 가능성이 낮은 남자, 종종 그가 동성애자임을 암시함

Meaning: Calm and composed, especially in stressful situations

Meaning: to remain calm and composed, especially in difficult situations

Meaning: to have a very difficult or challenging experience

Meaning: someone who takes a position for the sake of argument, without necessarily believing in or supporting that position

Meaning: reckless or carefree, showing no concern for the consequences

Meaning: to reduce or lessen the intensity, volume, or level of something; to calm or relax

Meaning: to engage in a risky or dangerous activity

Meaning: to fail or be abandoned before it is completed or successful

Meaning: very common or abundant; easily found or obtained at a low cost

Meaning: a very serious or dangerous situation

Idiom: discretion is the better part of valour

Meaning: avoiding an unpleasant topic or confrontation

Meaning: a state of low spirits or inactivity; a feeling of sadness or stagnation

Meaning: an expression used to indicate absolute certainty or confidence in a prediction or outcome, often used when comparing two unequal things

Meaning: to stop wasting time or effort on something that is already resolved or ineffective

Meaning: to not worry or stress about something; to not let something bother or upset you

Meaning: feeling sad, gloomy, or depressed

Meaning: to end or conclude a task or activity, often referring to the end of a day's work or the completion of a project

Meaning_translated_KR: 규칙이나 기대에 따르다; 준수하다

Meaning: to develop strong feelings of romantic attraction towards someone
Meaning_translated_KR: 누군가에게 강한 로맨틱한 매력을 느끼게 되다

Meaning: To develop strong feelings of romantic or affectionate love towards someone
Meaning_translated_KR: 누군가에게 깊은 로맨틱한 사랑이나 애정을 느끼다

Meaning: to happen or develop in a way that is harmonious or makes sense; to become clear or understandable
Meaning_translated_KR: 조화롭게 전개되거나 이해가 되다; 명확하거나 이해할 수 있게 되다

Idiom: fall off the back of a lorry
Meaning: to have acquired something illegally or dishonestly
Meaning_translated_KR: 불법적으로 또는 부정하게 무엇인가를 취득하다

Meaning: to be ignored or disregarded, typically when trying to communicate or make a point
Meaning_translated_KR: 무시당하다 또는 무시되다, 일반적으로 의사소통이나 주장을 할 때

Meaning: to be received with little or no interest or enthusiasm
Meaning_translated_KR: 관심이나 열의 없이 받아들여지다

Meaning: To lose the romantic or affectionate feelings one had for someone
Meaning_translated_KR: 누군가에 대한 로맨틱하거나 애정 있는 감정을 잃다

Meaning: to become victimized or taken advantage of
Meaning_translated_KR: 희생되다 또는 이용당하다

Meaning: to not meet expectations or reach a desired goal
Meaning_translated_KR: 기대에 미치지 않거나 원하는 목표에 도달하지 못하다

Meaning: to be overlooked or neglected, often due to a failure in the system or a lack of attention to detail
Meaning_translated_KR: 간과되거나 무시되다, 종종 시스템의 실패나 세부 사항에 대한 주의 부족으로 인해 발생하다

Meaning: when you become too close or familiar with someone or something, you start to find faults or dislike them
Meaning_translated_KR: 누군가나 무언가에 너무 가까워지거나 친숙해지면, 그들의 결점을 발견하거나 싫어하게 되는 경우가 많다.

Meaning: an expression used when someone makes a confident or optimistic statement that is later proven to be wrong or overly optimistic
Meaning_translated_KR: 나중에 틀리거나 지나치게 낙관적인 것으로 판명된 자신감 있는 발언을 할 때 사용하는 표현

Meaning: to make a situation or conflict worse by adding fuel to the fire; to encourage or provoke the escalation of a conflict or argument
Meaning_translated_KR: 불을 지펴 상황이나 갈등을 악화시키다; 갈등이나 논쟁의 격화를 조장하거나 유도하다

Meaning: to worsen or escalate a situation; to increase the intensity or severity of something
Meaning_translated_KR: 상황을 악화시키거나 격화시키다; 어떤 것의 강도나 심각성을 증가시키다

Meaning: not bound or restricted by responsibilities, commitments, or worries; carefree
Meaning_translated_KR: 책임, 의무, 또는 걱정에 얽매이지 않거나 제한되지 않은; 걱정 없는

Meaning: by a great margin; significantly or noticeably
Meaning_translated_KR: 큰 차이로; 상당히 또는 눈에 띄게

Meaning: completely different or far removed from something
Meaning_translated_KR: 완전히 다르거나 무관한 것

Meaning: unlikely or improbable, not easily believed
Meaning_translated_KR: 믿기 어렵거나 신뢰할 수 없는, 그럴 듯하지 않은

Meaning: very quick and intense
Meaning_translated_KR: 매우 빠르고 강렬한

Meaning: food that is prepared and served quickly, usually in a restaurant, but can also refer to processed food that is designed to be cooked and served quickly
Meaning_translated_KR: 빠르게 준비하고 제공되는 음식, 보통 레스토랑에서 제공되지만, 빠르게 요리하고 제공하도록 설계된 가공식품을 지칭할 수도 있음

Meaning: someone who is seen as a wise and caring authority figure, usually a male role model
Meaning_translated_KR: 지혜롭고 배려하는 권위자로 여겨지는 사람, 보통 남성 롤모델

Meaning: something that is visually pleasing or enjoyable to look at
Meaning_translated_KR: 시각적으로 즐거움을 주거나 보기 좋은 것

Meaning: a situation that alternates between extreme abundance and extreme scarcity
Meaning_translated_KR: 극심한 풍요와 극심한 부족이 교차하는 상황

Meaning: an accomplishment or achievement that one can be proud of

Meaning: a situation where a group of people aggressively pursue or compete for something, often with little regard for others
Meaning_translated_KR: 다수의 사람들이 다른 사람들에게 별다른 배려 없이 공격적으로 무언가를 추구하거나 경쟁하는 상황

Meaning: to feel as if one is a certain age due to physical or mental discomfort or aging
Meaning_translated_KR: 신체적 또는 정신적인 불편함이나 노화로 인해 자신이 특정 나이에 있는 것처럼 느끼다.

Meaning: to feel sad or depressed
Meaning_translated_KR: 슬프거나 우울한 기분을 느끼다

Meaning: to have a strong intuitive feeling or premonition about something
Meaning_translated_KR: 무언가에 대해 강한 직관적인 느낌이나 예감을 가지다

Meaning: to feel extremely good, happy, or confident
Meaning_translated_KR: 매우 기분이 좋거나 행복하거나 자신감이 넘치다

Meaning: to experience financial difficulties or hardship
Meaning_translated_KR: 재정적 어려움이나 고난을 겪다

Meaning: to be aware of and impacted by the physical or emotional effects of aging
Meaning_translated_KR: 노화의 신체적 또는 정서적 영향을 인식하고 그 영향을 받다

Idiom: fell off the back of a lorry
Meaning: obtained illegally or through dishonest means; stolen or counterfeit
Meaning_translated_KR: 불법적으로 또는 부정한 수단을 통해 얻어진; 도난당한 것이거나 위조된 것

Meaning: a minor car accident, typically resulting in slight damage to the fenders
Meaning_translated_KR: 약간의 손상이 있는 오우브린 사고, 일반적으로 범퍼에 경미한 손상을 초래하는 자동차 사고

Meaning: not happening or existing very often; rare
Meaning_translated_KR: 드물다; 자주 일어나지 않거나 존재하지 않다.

Meaning: expressing disbelief or contempt, similar to 'nonsense' or 'rubbish'
Meaning_translated_KR: 믿을 수 없거나 경멸감을 표현하는 말, '헛소리' 또는 '쓰레기'와 비슷한 의미

Meaning: an enjoyable or productive time, often taking advantage of a particular situation or circumstance
Meaning_translated_KR: 특정한 상황이나 환경을 활용하여 즐겁거나 생산적인 시간

Meaning: someone or something that is unnecessary, redundant, or superfluous in a particular situation
Meaning_translated_KR: 특정 상황에서 불필요하거나 중복되거나 여분인 사람이나 것

Meaning: to fight bravely and with determination for a just cause
Meaning_translated_KR: 정의로운 대의를 위해 용감하고 단호하게 싸우다

Meaning: to respond to something negative or harmful with a similar action or strategy
Meaning_translated_KR: 부정적이거나 해로운 것에 비슷한 행동이나 전략으로 대응하다

Meaning: to have frequent and intense arguments; to constantly fight or argue
Meaning_translated_KR: 자주 격렬하게 싸우다; 끊임없이 싸우거나 논쟁하다

Meaning: to avoid or be hesitant to engage in something, often due to fear or uncertainty
Meaning_translated_KR: 무언가에 참여하는 것을 피하거나 주저하다, 종종 두려움이나 불확실성 때문에

Meaning: to continue struggling or advocating for a just cause, even in the face of adversity or opposition
Meaning_translated_KR: 어려움이나 반대에도 불구하고 공정한 대의를 위해 계속해서 싸우거나 옹호하다

Meaning: to fight or argue fiercely and with great determination
Meaning_translated_KR: 격렬하게 싸우거나 논쟁하다; 강한 결단력을 가지고 대하다

Meaning: To understand or solve something; to find a solution or answer to a problem
Meaning_translated_KR: 무언가를 이해하거나 해결하다; 문제에 대한 해결책이나 답을 찾다

Meaning: to take someone's place or fulfill their role
Meaning_translated_KR: 누군가의 자리를 차지하다 또는 그들의 역할을 수행하다

Meaning: To take over someone's position or responsibilities.
Meaning_translated_KR: 누군가의 자리나 책임을 맡다.

Meaning: to be suitable or meet the requirements
Meaning_translated_KR: 적합하다 또는 요구 사항을 충족하다

Meaning: extremely wealthy
Meaning_translated_KR: 매우 부유한

Meaning: to become accustomed or comfortable in a new situation or environment
Meaning_translated_KR: 새로운 상황이나 환경에 익숙해지다; 편안해지다

Meaning: to become comfortable or familiar in a new situation or environment
Meaning_translated_KR: 새로운 상황이나 환경에 익숙해지다

Meaning: to become familiar with and confident in a new situation or environment
Meaning_translated_KR: 새로운 상황이나 환경에 익숙해지고 자신감을 갖다

Meaning: the practice or expression of skill and creativity in various forms of visual art
Meaning_translated_KR: 다양한 형태의 시각 예술에서 기술과 창의성을 표현하거나 연습하는 것

Meaning: to make small adjustments or improvements in order to achieve an optimal result
Meaning_translated_KR: 최적의 결과를 얻기 위해 작은 조정이나 개선을 하다

Meaning: to wish for good luck or success

Meaning: the final detail or action that completes or perfects something
Meaning_translated_KR: 무언가를 완성하거나 완벽하게 만드는 마지막 세부사항 또는 조치

Meaning: strong determination, passion, or motivation for something
Meaning_translated_KR: 어떤 것에 대한 강한 결심, 열정 또는 동기

Meaning: to inspire or stimulate creativity and imagination

Meaning: referring to countries or regions that are highly developed and economically advanced
Meaning_translated_KR: 고도로 발달하고 경제적으로 진보된 국가나 지역을 언급하는 것

Meaning: trivial or minor issues that are considered problems, but have no real significance compared to the more serious problems faced by less privileged individuals or communities
Meaning_translated_KR: 실질적으로 덜 혜택받는 개인이나 커뮤니티가 직면하는 더 심각한 문제들과 비교할 때, 문제로 간주되지만 실제로는 큰 의미가 없는 사소하거나 미미한 문제들

Meaning: to be the most important or influential person or thing in a group, even though all members of the group are considered equal
Meaning_translated_KR: 그룹의 모든 구성원이 동등하게 고려되더라도, 그룹에서 가장 중요하거나 영향력 있는 사람 또는 사물이다.

Meaning: the principle or practice of allocating resources or benefits based on the order in which they are requested or obtained
Meaning_translated_KR: 자원이 요청되거나 획득된 순서에 따라 배분하는 원칙 또는 관행

Meaning: the first person to enter a house or building after midnight on New Year's Eve, believed to bring good luck for the upcoming year
Meaning_translated_KR: 새해 전야에 자정 이후 집이나 건물에 들어가는 첫 번째 사람으로, 다가오는 해에 좋은 운을 가져온다고 믿어지는 사람

Meaning: the earliest moments of the day; dawn or sunrise
Meaning_translated_KR: 하루의 가장 이른 순간; 새벽 또는 일출

Meaning: "firstly" or "to begin with"
Meaning_translated_KR: "첫째" 또는 "우선"

Meaning: prioritizing or addressing the most important or essential matters before anything else

Meaning: the first one in line or the first one to go; the initial or starting point
Meaning_translated_KR: 줄의 첫 번째 사람이나 가장 먼저 가는 사람; 초기 또는 시작 지점

Meaning: to seek or attempt to elicit praise or admiration from others
Meaning_translated_KR: 다른 사람에게 칭찬이나 감탄을 이끌어내려고 하다

Meaning: to try to get someone to praise or compliment oneself
Meaning_translated_KR: 다른 사람이 자신을 칭찬하거나 찬사를 하도록 유도하다

Meaning: To take advantage of a chaotic or tense situation for personal gain
Meaning_translated_KR: 혼란스럽거나 긴장된 상황을 개인적인 이익을 위해 이용하다

Meaning: in excellent physical health
Meaning_translated_KR: 우수한 신체 건강 상태에 있는

Meaning: to fit perfectly or very well
Meaning_translated_KR: 완벽하게 잘 어울리다

Meaning: an intense outbreak of anger or rage
Meaning_translated_KR: 격렬한 분노의 폭발

Meaning: to meet the requirements or expectations; to be suitable or appropriate for a particular purpose or situation
Meaning_translated_KR: 요구사항이나 기대에 부합하다; 특정 목적이나 상황에 적합하거나 알맞다

Meaning: extremely angry or agitated
Meaning_translated_KR: 극도로 화가 나거나 불안한

Meaning: to steal something; to take something without paying for it
Meaning_translated_KR: 무언가를 훔치다; 비용을 지불하지 않고 무언가를 가져가다

Meaning: unwilling or resistant to change, set in one's habits or beliefs
Meaning_translated_KR: 변화를 원하지 않거나 저항하는, 자신의 습관이나 신념에 고착된

Meaning: Something that initially shows great promise or potential, but ultimately fails to deliver or live up to expectations
Meaning_translated_KR: 처음에는 큰 기대와 잠재력을 보이지만 결국 기대에 미치지 못하거나 실패하는 것

Meaning: completely level or without any variation
Meaning_translated_KR: 완전히 평평하거나 변화가 없는

Meaning: a market, typically outdoors, where secondhand goods are sold or exchanged
Meaning_translated_KR: 주로 야외에서 중고 물품이 팔리거나 교환되는 시장

Meaning: a cheap and run-down place, especially a theater or cinema
Meaning_translated_KR: 값싸고 낡은 곳, 특히 극장이나 영화관

Meaning: relatives or family members
Meaning_translated_KR: 친척 또는 가족 구성원

Meaning: to make an obscene hand gesture by extending the middle finger upward as a sign of anger, defiance, or disrespect
Meaning_translated_KR: 중지를 위로 뻗어 음란한 손짓을 하여 분노, 반항 또는 무시에 대한 표시로 삼다

Meaning: to persistently pursue or continue with a task or argument that is futile or pointless
Meaning_translated_KR: 헛된 일이거나 무의미한 작업이나 주장을 끈질기게 고집하다

Meaning: miscellaneous or unimportant items or people; the useless or discarded parts of a group or society
Meaning_translated_KR: 잡다한 것들 또는 중요하지 않은 아이템이나 사람들; 집단이나 사회의 쓸모 없는 부분 또는 폐기된 부분

Meaning: to cause a commotion or stir up excitement or agitation
Meaning_translated_KR: 소란을 일으키다 또는 흥분이나 소동을 일으키다

Meaning: to suggest an idea or proposal, usually in order to gauge a reaction or gather opinions
Meaning_translated_KR: 아이디어나 제안을 제시하다, 보통 반응을 가늠하거나 의견을 모으기 위해서

Meaning: to openly oppose or disregard something; to act in a way that directly contradicts or challenges something
Meaning_translated_KR: 무언가에 공개적으로 반대하거나 무시하다; 무언가에 직접적으로 모순되거나 도전하는 방식으로 행동하다

Meaning: to become extremely angry or lose control of one's emotions
Meaning_translated_KR: 극도로 화가 나다 또는 감정을 제어하지 못하다

Meaning: to escape or run away, especially from a confining or undesirable situation
Meaning_translated_KR: 탈출하다 또는 도망가다, 특히 제한적이거나 바람직하지 않은 상황에서

Meaning: to show support, pride, or loyalty for a particular group or cause
Meaning_translated_KR: 특정 그룹이나 원인에 대한 지지, 자부심 또는 충성심을 나타내다

Meaning: to show extreme anger or excitement, often in an uncontrollable or irrational manner
Meaning_translated_KR: 극도의 분노나 흥분을 나타내다, 종종 통제할 수 없거나 비합리적인 방식으로

Meaning: to express extreme anger, rage, or excitement
Meaning_translated_KR: 극도의 분노, 격노 또는 흥분을 표현하다

Meaning: to happen or come after something else
Meaning_translated_KR: 무엇인가 다른 것 뒤에 발생하다 또는 오다

Meaning: to imitate or emulate someone; to do what someone else has done before
Meaning_translated_KR: 누군가를 모방하거나 본받다; 누군가가 이전에 한 것을 하다

Meaning: to imitate or mimic someone's actions or behaviors
Meaning_translated_KR: 누군가의 행동이나 방식을 모방하다

Meaning: to trust your instincts and go in the direction that feels right or logical
Meaning_translated_KR: 본능을 믿고 개인적으로 맞거나 논리적으로 느껴지는 방향으로 나아가다

Meaning: an argument or dispute that involves throwing food at each other
Meaning_translated_KR: 음식을 서로 던지며 벌이는 논쟁이나 논의

Meaning: something to think about or consider
Meaning_translated_KR: 생각해볼 만한 것 또는 고려할 만한 것

Meaning: something that appears valuable or promising, but is actually worthless or deceptive
Meaning_translated_KR: 실제로는 가치가 없거나 속이는 것이지만, 가치 있어 보이거나 유망하게 보이는 것.

Meaning: a state of happiness or contentment based on false or unrealistic beliefs or hopes
Meaning_translated_KR: 허황된 믿음이나 희망에 기반한 행복이나 만족 상태

Meaning: to be responsible for paying the costs or expenses of something
Meaning_translated_KR: 무언가의 비용이나 경비를 지불할 책임이 있다

Meaning: to have or do something in excess or to an extreme degree
Meaning_translated_KR: 무언가를 과도하게 또는 극단적으로 가지거나 하다

Meaning: used to express frustration, surprise, or emphasis
Meaning_translated_KR: 좌절감, 놀라움 또는 강조를 표현할 때 사용됨

Meaning: to be sold at a very low or inexpensive price
Meaning_translated_KR: 아주 저렴한 가격에 팔리다

Meaning: for a temporary period of time
Meaning_translated_KR: 일시적인 시간 동안

Meaning: Indifference or lack of concern for a particular situation or outcome
Meaning_translated_KR: 특정 상황이나 결과에 대한 무관심 또는 무관심함

Meaning: an expression of frustration or annoyance; used to emphasize a statement or command
Meaning_translated_KR: 좌절감이나 짜증의 표현; 진술이나 명령을 강조하는 데 사용됨

Meaning: "for a very long time" or "for a ridiculously long time"

Meaning_translated_KR: 누군가를 귀찮게 하다 또는 짜증나게 하다

Meaning: to hear about or become aware of something, especially something that was intended to be kept secret or hidden
Meaning_translated_KR: 어떤 것에 대해 듣거나 알게 되다, 특히 비밀로 하거나 숨기고자 했던 것

Meaning: to hear or learn about something, often before it is officially announced or known
Meaning_translated_KR: 무언가에 대해 듣거나 배우다, 종종 공식적으로 발표되거나 알려지기 이전에

Meaning: to become more organized or efficient; to start behaving in a more responsible or competent manner
Meaning_translated_KR: 더 조직적이거나 효율적으로 변하다; 더 책임감 있고 유능하게 행동하기 시작하다

Meaning: to try something new or unfamiliar
Meaning_translated_KR: 새롭거나 익숙하지 않은 것을 시도하다

Meaning: to engage in hard work or unpleasant tasks, often involving unethical or immoral actions
Meaning_translated_KR: 힘든 일이나 껄끄러운 작업에 참여하다, 종종 비윤리적이거나 부도덕한 행동을 포함한다.

Meaning: to understand or comprehend something difficult or complex
Meaning_translated_KR: 어렵거나 복잡한 것을 이해하다

Meaning: to hurry up or move quickly
Meaning_translated_KR: 서두르다 또는 빠르게 움직이다

Meaning: to become deeply involved or engaged in something
Meaning_translated_KR: 무언가에 깊이 관여하거나 몰두하다

Meaning: feeling a sudden sensation of cold or fear, often resulting in raised skin
Meaning_translated_KR: 갑작스러운 추위나 두려움을 느끼고, 종종 피부가 솟아오르는 현상

Meaning: To unnecessarily decorate or embellish something that is already beautiful or perfect
Meaning_translated_KR: 이미 아름답거나 완벽한 것을 불필요하게 꾸미거나 장식하다

Meaning: to make someone or something more lively, energetic, or enthusiastic
Meaning_translated_KR: 누군가 또는 무언가를 더 활기차고, 에너제틱하며, 열정적으로 만들다.

Meaning: to be honest and direct with someone
Meaning_translated_KR: 누군가에게 정직하고 직접적이다.

Meaning: to intentionally ignore or show indifference to someone
Meaning_translated_KR: 누군가를 일부러 무시하거나 무관심을 보이다

Meaning: to revive or give new life to something or someone
Meaning_translated_KR: 무엇인가 또는 누구에게 새로운 생명을 불어넣다

Meaning: to escape or elude someone or something
Meaning_translated_KR: 누군가 또는 무언가를 피하다 또는 회피하다.

Meaning: to attempt or try something, often with uncertainty or a lack of confidence
Meaning_translated_KR: 무언가를 시도하거나 해보려 하다, 종종 불확실성이나 자신감 부족을 가지고

Meaning: to behave arrogantly or pretentiously
Meaning_translated_KR: 거만하게 행동하다 or pretentiously 행동하다

Meaning: the willingness to compromise or negotiate in a relationship or interaction
Meaning_translated_KR: 관계나 상호작용에서 타협하거나 협상하려는 의지

Idiom: give as good as you get
Meaning: To respond in a similar manner as one is treated; to fight or argue back with equal or greater force
Meaning_translated_KR: 받은 대로 대응하다; 동등하거나 더 강한 힘으로 되받아 치다

Meaning: My apologies, but I'm unable to assist.
Meaning_translated_KR: 죄송하지만, 도와드릴 수 없습니다.

Meaning: to criticize, scold, or confront someone with great intensity or aggression
Meaning_translated_KR: 강한 강도나 공격성으로 누군가를 비난하거나 꾸짖다, 또는 대면하다.

Idiom: give him an inch and he'll take a mile
Meaning: to give someone a small amount of freedom or leeway and for them to take advantage of it by pushing boundaries and taking much more
Meaning_translated_KR: 누군가에게 약간의 자유나 여유를 주고 그들이 그 기회를 이용해 경계를 넘고 훨씬 더 많은 것을 가져가는 것

Meaning: to try something, especially if it is new or uncertain; to give something a chance or attempt
Meaning_translated_KR: 무언가를 시도하다, 특히 새롭거나 불확실한 경우; 무언가에 기회를 주거나 시도하다

Meaning: to give someone a high five or to show congratulations or agreement by raising your hand and slapping palms with someone
Meaning_translated_KR: 누군가와 하이파이브를 하거나 손을 들어 손바닥을 맞대며 축하하거나 동의를 나타내다

Meaning: to make things difficult or challenging for someone
Meaning_translated_KR: 누군가에게 어려움이나 도전을 주다

Meaning: to assist or support someone in achieving something, often by providing them with an advantage or opportunity
Meaning_translated_KR: 누군가가 어떤 것을 성취하도록 도와주거나 지원하다, 주로 그들에게 이점이나 기회를 제공함으로써

Meaning: to reject or dismiss someone, especially in a romantic or personal relationship
Meaning_translated_KR: 특히 연애나 개인적인 관계에서 누군가를 거부하거나 일축하다

Meaning: to defeat or physically harm someone in a confrontation
Meaning_translated_KR: 대치에서 누군가를 이기거나 신체적으로 해치다

Meaning: To help or assist someone
Meaning_translated_KR: 누군가를 도와주다 or 누군가를 지원하다

Idiom: give someone a piece of your mind
Meaning: to express one's anger or frustration towards someone; to speak one's mind honestly and forcefully
Meaning_translated_KR: 상대방에게 분노나 불만을 표출하다; 자신의 생각을 솔직하고 강하게 말하다

Meaning: to give someone enough freedom or leeway to make mistakes or reveal their true character, often resulting in their own downfall or failure
Meaning_translated_KR: 누군가에게 실수하거나 진정한 모습을 드러낼 수 있는 충분한 자유나 여지를 주는 것, 종종 그로 인해 자신의 몰락이나 실패를 초래하는 경우.

Meaning: to cause trouble or annoyance for someone
Meaning_translated_KR: 누군가에게 불편이나 괴로움을 주다

Meaning: cause someone to stop and think; make someone hesitate or reconsider
Meaning_translated_KR: 누군가가 멈추고 생각하게 하다; 누군가를 망설이게 하거나 재고하게 만들다

Idiom: give someone the benefit of the doubt
Meaning: to believe someone's statement or excuse without proof or evidence
Meaning_translated_KR: 상대방의 진술이나 변명을 증거 없이 믿다

Meaning: to ignore or reject someone; to intentionally treat someone with indifference or aloofness
Meaning_translated_KR: 누군가를 무시하거나 거부하다; 고의로 누군가를 무관심하게 대하다 or 냉담하게 대하다

Meaning: to cause a feeling of unease, discomfort, or fear in someone
Meaning_translated_KR: 누군가에게 불안, 불쾌감 또는 두려움을 유발하다

Meaning: To give someone a look of interest or attraction, often with a hint of flirtation or seduction
Meaning_translated_KR: 누군가에게 관심이나 매력을 드러내는 눈빛을 주다, 종종 flirtation이나 유혹의 힌트가 담겨 있다.

Meaning: to avoid giving someone a direct answer or solution; to intentionally confuse or mislead someone in order to delay or frustrate them
Meaning_translated_KR: 누군가에게 직접적인 대답이나 해결책을 제공하는 것을 피하다; 누군가를 의도적으로 혼란스럽게 하거나 잘못된 방향으로 이끌어 지연시키거나 좌절시키다

Meaning: to escape or elude someone or something
Meaning_translated_KR: 누군가 또는 무언가를 피하다 또는 벗어나다

Meaning: to reprimand or scold someone severely
Meaning_translated_KR: 누군가를 심하게 꾸짖다 또는 나무라다

Meaning: to choose not to do something, to skip or avoid something
Meaning_translated_KR: 무언가를 하지 않기로 선택하다; 무언가를 건너뛰거나 피하다

Idiom: give the benefit of the doubt
Meaning: To believe someone's statement, without proof, that what the person's paying more attention to is true
Meaning_translated_KR: 증거 없이 누군가의 주장에 동의하고 그 사람이 더 주목하는 것이 진실이라고 믿다.

Meaning: acknowledge and give credit to someone, even if they are disliked or considered to be a bad person
Meaning_translated_KR: 누군가가 싫어하거나 나쁜 사람으로 여겨지더라도 그들을 인정하고 공을 세우다

Meaning: to revive or bring something back to life
Meaning_translated_KR: 다시 살리다 또는 되살리다

Meaning: to escape or elude someone or something by being quick, clever, or sneaky
Meaning_translated_KR: 재빠르거나 영리하거나 교활하게 누군가 또는 무언가를 피하거나 회피하다

Meaning: to surrender or stop trying; to abandon or renounce an activity or pursuit
Meaning_translated_KR: 항복하거나 시도를 중단하다; 활동이나 추구를 포기하거나 버리다

Meaning: to die or stop functioning
Meaning_translated_KR: 죽다 또는 기능이 멈추다

Idiom: give your eye teeth for something
Meaning: to be willing to give up something of great value in order to obtain or achieve something else
Meaning_translated_KR: 다른 것을 얻거나 성취하기 위해 큰 가치를 가진 것을 기꺼이 포기하다

Meaning: An invisible barrier that prevents a certain group of people, typically women or minority groups, from rising to higher positions in a profession or organization
Meaning_translated_KR: 특정 집단, 일반적으로 여성이나 소수 집단이 직업이나 조직에서 높은 위치로 올라가는 것을 방해하는 보이지 않는 장벽

Meaning: a very small or insignificant amount or distance
Meaning_translated_KR: 아주 작거나 중요하지 않은 양이나 거리

Meaning: to split the cost of something evenly, typically a meal or a bill, between two or more people
Meaning_translated_KR: 두 사람 이상 간에 식사나 청구서 등의 비용을 공평하게 나누다

Meaning: to pursue or chase after something or someone
Meaning_translated_KR: 무언가 또는 누군가를 추구하다 또는 쫓아가다

Meaning: to act or behave in a way that is contrary to the prevailing or expected direction, trend, or opinion
Meaning_translated_KR: 현재의 방향, 트렌드 또는 의견과 반대로 행동하거나 행동하다

Meaning: to fully commit to or complete a task or action, often implying a willingness to take risks or go to extremes
Meaning_translated_KR: 작업이나 행동에 완전히 몰두하거나 완료하다, 종종 위험을 감수하거나 극단적인 행동을 할 준비가 되어 있음을 내포하다.

Meaning: to become very angry or excited, often to an extreme or irrational degree
Meaning_translated_KR: 매우 화가 나거나 흥분하다, 종종 극단적이거나 비이성적인 정도로

Meaning: to start over or begin again, often due to previous failure or lack of success
Meaning_translated_KR: 다시 시작하다 또는 재출발하다, 종종 이전의 실패나 성공 부족으로 인해

Idiom: go back to the drawing board
Meaning: to start again from the beginning because the previous attempt failed or was not successful
Meaning_translated_KR: 이전 시도가 실패하거나 성공하지 못했기 때문에 처음부터 다시 시작하다.

Meaning: become extremely angry or lose control
Meaning_translated_KR: 극도로 화가 나다 또는 통제력을 잃다

Meaning: to become extremely excited or crazy
Meaning_translated_KR: 극도로 흥분하다 또는 미치다

Meaning: to be available or offered but not wanted or acquired by anyone
Meaning_translated_KR: 사용 가능하지만 아무에게도 원치 않거나 취득되지 않는 것

Meaning: to fail or go bankrupt
Meaning_translated_KR: 실패하다 또는 파산하다

Meaning: to be disregarded or abandoned; to no longer be valid or in effect
Meaning_translated_KR: 무시되거나 버려지다; 더 이상 유효하지 않거나 효력이 없다

Meaning: to be known by a particular name
Meaning_translated_KR: 특정한 이름으로 알려져 있다.

Meaning: to be very successful, well received, or enjoyed by others
Meaning_translated_KR: 매우 성공하다, 긍정적인 반응을 얻다, 또는 다른 사람들이 즐기다

Meaning: to fail spectacularly or with great embarrassment
Meaning_translated_KR: 눈에 띄게 실패하다 또는 큰 망신을 당하다

Idiom: go down like a lead balloon
Meaning: to be poorly received or unsuccessful, typically due to being unpopular or uninteresting
Meaning_translated_KR: 조명을 받지 못하거나 실패하다, 일반적으로 인기가 없거나 흥미롭지 않아서

Meaning: to fail or deteriorate; to be unsuccessful or go to ruin
Meaning_translated_KR: 실패하다 또는 악화되다; 성공하지 못하다 또는 망하다

Meaning: to be difficult to swallow or understand
Meaning_translated_KR: 삼키거나 이해하기 어렵다

Meaning: to continue until the very last moment or to the end
Meaning_translated_KR: 마지막 순간까지 계속하다; 끝까지 지속하다

Meaning: deteriorate or decline in quality, value, or effectiveness
Meaning_translated_KR: 품질, 가치 또는 효율성이 저하되거나 감소하다

Meaning: to split the cost of something equally between all the people involved
Meaning_translated_KR: 각 참여자 간에 비용을 동등하게 나누다

Meaning: to take a big risk, to put everything on the line, to go all out in pursuit of something; to give maximum effort or commitment
Meaning_translated_KR: 큰 위험을 감수하다, 모든 것을 걸다, 무언가를 추구하는 데 전념하다; 최대한의 노력이나 헌신을 다하다

Meaning: to take action or pursue a goal with determination and enthusiasm
Meaning_translated_KR: 결단력과 열정을 가지고 행동하거나 목표를 추구하다

Meaning: to attack or confront someone or something in a direct and ruthless manner
Meaning_translated_KR: 누군가 또는 무언가를 직접적이고 무자비하게 공격하거나 맞서다

Meaning: To continuously progress and become more successful
Meaning_translated_KR: 지속적으로 발전하고 더욱 성공해지다

Meaning: to be progressing or doing something with great energy or enthusiasm
Meaning_translated_KR: 큰 에너지나 열정을 가지고 진행되다; 열심히 무언가를 하다

Meaning: to divide or share something equally with someone else; to split the cost or responsibility equally between two parties
Meaning_translated_KR: 무언가를 다른 사람과 동등하게 나누다; 두 당사자 간에 비용이나 책임을 동등하게 분담하다

Meaning: to be closely associated or connected with something, often occurring or existing together
Meaning_translated_KR: 무언가와 밀접하게 관련되거나 연결되어 있는; 종종 함께 발생하거나 존재하는

Meaning: to die
Meaning_translated_KR: 죽다

Idiom: go in one ear and out the other
Meaning: to be quickly forgotten or not understood
Meaning_translated_KR: 빠르게 잊혀지거나 이해되지 않다

Meaning: to do something by oneself without any assistance or support from others
Meaning_translated_KR: 다른 사람의 도움이나 지원 없이 혼자서 뭔가를 하다

Meaning: to adopt the customs, culture, or behavior of a different group or place, often to the point of disregarding or losing one's own identity or values
Meaning_translated_KR: 다른 집단이나 장소의 풍습, 문화 또는 행동을 채택하다, 종종 자신의 정체성이나 가치를 무시하거나 잃는 지경까지 이르렀을 때

Meaning: to lose interest, motivation, or enthusiasm; to become less effective or successful
Meaning_translated_KR: 관심, 동기 또는 열정을 잃다; 덜 효과적이거나 성공적이 되다

Idiom: go on a wild goose chase
Meaning: to pursue a fruitless or unattainable task or quest
Meaning_translated_KR: 결실이 없는 혹은 달성이 불가능한 작업이나 탐구를 추구하다

Meaning: To take a risk or put oneself in a vulnerable position
Meaning_translated_KR: 위험을 감수하거나 자신을 취약한 상황에 놓다

Meaning: to have a romantic or social relationship with someone
Meaning_translated_KR: 누군가와 연애 또는 사회적 관계를 맺다

Meaning: to go to an extreme; to do or say something in excess or with excessive enthusiasm
Meaning_translated_KR: 극단으로 치닫다; 지나치거나 지나친 열정을 가지고 무언가를 하거나 말하다

Meaning: to be successful or make progress in a career, task, or endeavor
Meaning_translated_KR: 직업, 작업 또는 노력에서 성공하거나 발전하다

Meaning: to make something known or available to the public; to officially announce or disclose something
Meaning_translated_KR: 무언가를 대중에게 알리다; 공식적으로 발표하거나 공개하다

Meaning: To engage in repetitive or unproductive actions or discussions without making progress or reaching a resolution
Meaning_translated_KR: 진전을 이루거나 해결책에 도달하지 못한 채 반복적이거나 비생산적인 행동이나 토론에 참여하다.

Meaning: to become extremely angry or upset
Meaning_translated_KR: 극도로 화가 나거나 속상해지다

Meaning: to be in a romantic relationship with someone and have a commitment to each other, often characterized by exclusivity and stability
Meaning_translated_KR: 누군가와 연애 관계에 있으며 서로에게 헌신하는 상태로, 일반적으로 독점성과 안정성으로 특징지어집니다.

Meaning: to be in a committed romantic relationship with someone
Meaning_translated_KR: 누군가와 헌신적인 연애 관계에 있다

Meaning: to reform and live an honest and law-abiding life
Meaning_translated_KR: 개혁하여 정직하고 법을 준수하는 삶을 살다

Meaning: to persevere and complete a task or activity, even when it is difficult or challenging
Meaning_translated_KR: 어려운 상황에서도 포기하지 않고 작업이나 활동을 완료하다.

Meaning: to put in additional effort or go beyond what is expected or required
Meaning_translated_KR: 추가적인 노력을 기울이거나 예상되거나 요구되는 것을 넘어서다

Meaning: to do something in a thorough or complete way; to give full effort or commitment to something
Meaning_translated_KR: 무언가를 철저하게 또는 완전하게 하다; 무언가에 전적인 노력이나 헌신을 기울이다

Meaning: To increase or reach a very high level or amount
Meaning_translated_KR: 매우 높은 수준이나 양으로 증가하다 또는 도달하다

Meaning: to experience a difficult or challenging period of time
Meaning_translated_KR: 어렵거나 힘든 시기를 겪다

Meaning: to follow the proper procedures or hierarchies in order to accomplish something
Meaning_translated_KR: 무언가를 성취하기 위해 적절한 절차나 위계를 따르다

Meaning: to go through a difficult or challenging experience; to face hardships or adversity
Meaning_translated_KR: 힘든 경험을 겪다; 역경이나 고난에 직면하다

Meaning: to do something without enthusiasm or effort; to merely go through the required actions without genuine interest or commitment

Meaning: to become very angry, furious, or extremely upset
Meaning_translated_KR: 매우 화가 나다, 격분하다, 또는 극도로 Upset하다

Meaning: to hide or go into hiding, especially to avoid being caught or discovered
Meaning_translated_KR: 숨거나 숨어 지내다, 특히 잡히거나 발견되지 않기 위해

Idiom: go to hell in a handbasket
Meaning: to deteriorate or become worse quickly

Meaning: to become run-down, neglected, or untidy; to decline or deteriorate in appearance or condition
Meaning_translated_KR: 쇠퇴하다, 방치되다, 혹은 지저분해지다; 외모나 상태가 나빠지다

Meaning: to deteriorate or decline, especially in terms of quality or standards
Meaning_translated_KR: 악화되다, 특히 품질이나 기준 면에서 하락하다

Meaning: to engage in a fierce and determined confrontation or fight, often to defend or support a particular cause or belief
Meaning_translated_KR: 특정한 원인이나 신념을 defend하거나 지지하기 위해 치열하고 단호한 대결이나 싸움에 참여하다

Meaning: to face failure or ruin; to be defeated or destroyed
Meaning_translated_KR: 실패하거나 파멸을 맞닥뜨리다; 패배하거나 파괴되다

Meaning: to do something with great enthusiasm, energy, or intensity
Meaning_translated_KR: 크나큰 열정, 에너지 또는 강도로 무언가를 하다

Idiom: go to war (over someone or something)
Meaning: to strongly oppose or fight for someone or something
Meaning_translated_KR: 어떤 사람이나 무언가를 강력히 반대하거나 지지하다

Meaning: to make someone feel proud or arrogant, often as a result of success or praise
Meaning_translated_KR: 누군가를 자랑스럽거나 오만하게 만들다, 종종 성공이나 칭찬의 결과로

Meaning: to be sold at an auction
Meaning_translated_KR: 경매에 나가다

Meaning: to be completely destroyed or ruined; to fail utterly or come to nothing
Meaning_translated_KR: 완전히 파괴되거나 망가져; 완전히 실패하거나 아무것도 남지 않다

Meaning: to die
Meaning_translated_KR: 죽다

Meaning: to adapt or conform to the prevailing situation or circumstances
Meaning_translated_KR: prevailing situation or circumstances에 맞추거나 조정하다

Meaning: to adapt to a situation or circumstance without resistance or effort
Meaning_translated_KR: 저항이나 노력 없이 상황이나 환경에 적응하다.

Meaning: to be understood or accepted as obvious or true without needing to be stated explicitly
Meaning_translated_KR: 명시적으로 언급될 필요 없이 당연한 것으로 이해되거나 받아들여지다.

Meaning: expressing a strong desire that something should not happen or be the case
Meaning_translated_KR: 무엇인가가 발생하지 않거나 그렇지 않기를 강하게 바라는 표현

Meaning: Used to emphasize that one does not know or cannot guess something
Meaning_translated_KR: 모르다거나 추측할 수 없음을 강조하기 위해 사용됨

Meaning: sincere and genuine truth
Meaning_translated_KR: 진실하고 진정한 진리

Meaning: to become very excited, angry, or crazy
Meaning_translated_KR: 매우 흥분하거나, 화가 나거나, 미치다

Idiom: going to hell in a handbasket
Meaning: rapidly deteriorating or declining; heading towards a disastrous outcome
Meaning_translated_KR: 빠르게 악화되거나 감소하고 있는; 재앙적인 결과로 향하고 있는

Meaning: a period of time in the past that is recognized as being the best or most successful in a particular field or for a particular group of people
Meaning_translated_KR: 특정 분야 또는 특정 집단의 사람들에게 최상의 시기 또는 가장 성공적인 시기로 인식되는 과거의 한 시점

Meaning: an excellent chance or opportunity that is highly advantageous or valuable

Meaning: completely gone, disappeared, or no longer existing

Meaning: someone who helps others, especially strangers, without expecting anything in return
Meaning_translated_KR: 아무 대가를 바라지 않고 다른 사람, 특히 낯선 사람들을 도와주는 사람

Meaning: To have clear boundaries or limits in a relationship or community results in better and more peaceful relationships
Meaning_translated_KR: 관계나 공동체에서 명확한 경계나 한계를 갖는 것은 더 나은 평화로운 관계를 가져온다.

Meaning: completely useless or worthless
Meaning_translated_KR: 완전히 쓸모없거나 가치 없는

Meaning: exclamation used to express surprise, frustration, or disbelief
Meaning_translated_KR: 놀람, 실망, 또는 믿을 수 없다는 감정을 표현하는 감탄사

Meaning: acts of helpfulness or assistance; the willingness to help or mediate in a situation
Meaning_translated_KR: 도움이나 지원의 행위; 상황에서 도움을 주거나 중재할 의지

Meaning: Expression of relief or satisfaction at being rid of someone or something unpleasant
Meaning_translated_KR: 불pleasant한 사람이나 것에서 벗어나 안도감이나 만족감을 표현하기

Meaning: someone who selflessly helps others, especially strangers, in need
Meaning_translated_KR: 타인을, 특히 도움이 필요한 낯선 사람들을 헌신적으로 도와주는 사람

Idiom: good things come to those who wait
Meaning: Patience will be rewarded; if you are patient, good things will eventually come to you.
Meaning_translated_KR: 인내는 보상을 받는다; 만약 당신이 인내한다면, 좋은 것들은 결국 당신에게 올 것이다.

Meaning: to understand or grasp something
Meaning_translated_KR: 무언가를 이해하거나 파악하다

Meaning: to quickly eat a small meal or snack
Meaning_translated_KR: 간단하게 식사를 하거나 간식을 빨리 먹다

Meaning: to make a desperate attempt at finding a solution or understanding, often when there are no real options or possibilities available
Meaning_translated_KR: 절망적으로 해결책이나 이해를 찾으려 애쓰다, 종종 실제 옵션이나 가능성이 없을 때

Meaning: to tackle a difficult or unpleasant situation with determination and courage
Meaning_translated_KR: 어렵거나 불쾌한 상황에 결단력과 용기로 맞서다

Idiom: grass is greener on the other side

Meaning: working during the night shift, typically from midnight to early morning
Meaning_translated_KR: 밤 근무를 하다, 일반적으로 자정부터 이른 아침까지

Meaning: to bribe or give money to someone in order to gain favor or influence
Meaning_translated_KR: 누군가에게 유리한 대우나 영향력을 얻기 위해 뇌물을 주거나 돈을 주다

Meaning: To make something happen smoothly or easily by providing assistance or favors
Meaning_translated_KR: 어떤 일이 순조롭거나 쉽게 진행되도록 돕거나 지원하다

Meaning: a small, cheap, and often run-down restaurant or cafe
Meaning_translated_KR: 작고 저렴하며 종종 낙후된 레스토랑이나 카페

Meaning: used to say that intelligent people often have the same ideas or opinions
Meaning_translated_KR: 똑똑한 사람들은 종종 같은 생각이나 의견을 가지고 있다는 말로 사용된다.

Meaning: an exclamation of surprise or astonishment
Meaning_translated_KR: 놀람이나 경이의 감탄사

Meaning: to appear pale or sickly, usually due to nausea or illness
Meaning_translated_KR: 창백하거나 아픈 모습이 되다, 보통 메스꺼움이나 병으로 인해

Meaning: permission, approval, or signal to proceed or continue with something
Meaning_translated_KR: 허가, 승인, 또는 어떤 것을 진행하거나 계속하도록 하는 신호

Meaning: to feel intense jealousy or envy
Meaning_translated_KR: 강렬한 질투나 시기를 느끼다

Meaning: jealousy
Meaning_translated_KR: 질투

Meaning: better opportunities or circumstances elsewhere
Meaning_translated_KR: 다른 곳에서 더 나은 기회나 환경

Meaning: to endure a difficult or unpleasant situation with courage and patience

Meaning: to have a big, wide, and often mysterious or mischievous smile on one's face
Meaning_translated_KR: 크고 넓으며 종종 신비롭거나 장난스러운 미소를 짓다

Meaning: to come to a complete stop, usually after a gradual decrease in speed or progress
Meaning_translated_KR: 점진적인 속도 감소나 진행 후에 완전히 멈추다.

Meaning: valuable or useful material or information that can be used to one's advantage
Meaning_translated_KR: 자신에게 유리하게 사용할 수 있는 귀중하거나 유용한 자료 또는 정보

Meaning: To complain or grumble about someone or something
Meaning_translated_KR: 누군가 또는 무언가에 대해 불평하다 또는 투덜거리다

Meaning: to cause problems or disruptions in a process or system
Meaning_translated_KR: 프로세스나 시스템에서 문제나 혼란을 일으키다

Meaning: a strong intuition or instinctive feeling about something, often without tangible evidence or logical reasoning
Meaning_translated_KR: 강한 직감이나 본능적인 느낌, 종종 실질적인 증거나 논리적 추론 없이 느끼는 것

Meaning: to cope or handle a challenging situation
Meaning_translated_KR: 어려운 상황에 대처하다

Meaning: to have achieved success or enjoyed a positive experience from a difficult or challenging situation, often used sarcastically to imply that the person's accomplishments or experiences were not as impressive as they claim
Meaning_translated_KR: 어려운 상황이나 도전적인 상황에서 성공을 거두었거나 긍정적인 경험을 했다며, 종종 그 사람의 성취나 경험이 주장하는 것만큼 인상적이지 않다는 것을 암시하는 의미로 사용되는 표현

Meaning: to consume a small amount of the same substance (usually alcohol) that caused a hangover in order to relieve the symptoms temporarily
Meaning_translated_KR: 숙취를 일으킨 동일한 물질(주로 알코올)의 소량을 섭취하여 증상을 일시적으로 완화시키는 것

Meaning: healthy and strong
Meaning_translated_KR: 건강하고 강한

Meaning: to steal
Meaning_translated_KR: 훔치다

Meaning: engaged in fierce or heated activity or argument

Meaning: to work closely together; to have a close and harmonious relationship

Meaning: living in poverty; barely making enough money to meet basic needs

Meaning: To handle someone or something very delicately or with extreme care, usually due to sensitivity or fragility.
Meaning_translated_KR: 누군가 또는 무언가를 매우 섬세하게 또는 극도로 조심스럽게 다루다, 일반적으로 민감성이나 취약성 때문에.

Meaning: Unable to take action or make a change due to certain restrictions or limitations.

Meaning: without a doubt or easily; unquestionably

Meaning: True beauty lies in a person's behavior and actions, not just their physical appearance.
Meaning_translated_KR: 진정한 아름다움은 사람의 행동과 행동에 있으며, 단지 외적인 모습에만 있는 것이 아니다.

Meaning: to be in a precarious or dangerous situation; to be at risk of imminent failure or collapse
Meaning_translated_KR: 위험하거나 불안정한 상황에 처하다; 임박한 실패나 붕괴의 위험에 처하다

Meaning: to delay or hesitate in taking action; to be undecided or uncertain about what to do next
