Meaning: to persevere, keep going, or stay determined despite difficulties or challenges
Meaning_translated_KR: 어려움이나 도전에도 불구하고 인내하며 계속 나아가거나 결단력을 유지하다

Meaning: to hold tightly; to wait patiently; to continue to persevere
Meaning_translated_KR: 단단히 붙잡다; 인내심을 가지고 기다리다; 계속해서 견디다

Meaning: to remain strong and persevere in difficult or challenging situations
Meaning_translated_KR: 어려운 상황에서 강하게 버티고 인내하다

Meaning: to end a phone call
Meaning_translated_KR: 전화 통화를 종료하다

Meaning: extremely happy and content
Meaning_translated_KR: 매우 행복하고 만족스러운

Meaning: feeling conflicting emotions of happiness and sadness at the same time
Meaning_translated_KR: 행복과 슬픔을 동시에 느끼는 감정의 갈등

Meaning: tough, unfeeling, or unsympathetic
Meaning_translated_KR: 단호한, 무감각한, 또는 비정한

Meaning: unfortunate or tough luck; a situation in which someone has to accept something unpleasant or disappointing
Meaning_translated_KR: 불행한 상황 또는 어려운 운; 누군가가 불쾌하거나 실망스러운 것을 받아들여야 하는 상황

Meaning: to persistently dwell on or discuss a particular subject, often in a critical or complaining manner
Meaning_translated_KR: 특정 주제에 persistently 집중하거나 논의하다, 종종 비판적이거나 불평하는 방식으로

Meaning: someone who was once popular or successful but is no longer relevant or important
Meaning_translated_KR: 한때 인기 있었거나 성공했지만 이제는 더 이상 관련이 없거나 중요하지 않은 사람

Meaning: Rushing or being too hasty can result in mistakes or wasted effort.
Meaning_translated_KR: 서두르거나 너무 급하게 행동하면 실수나 낭비된 노력을 초래할 수 있다.

Meaning: to approach someone with humility or deference, typically to ask for a favor
Meaning_translated_KR: 겸손하거나 존경을 표하며 누군가에게 다가가다, 일반적으로 부탁을 하다

Meaning: an achievement of three significant successes or accomplishments in a row, often used in reference to sports
Meaning_translated_KR: 연속으로 이루어진 세 가지 주요 성공이나 성과, 주로 스포츠와 관련하여 사용됨

Meaning: To have an intense and deep dislike for someone
Meaning_translated_KR: 누군가에 대해 강렬하고 깊은 싫어함을 가지다.

Meaning: to criticize or reprimand someone severely
Meaning_translated_KR: 누군가를 심하게 비난하거나 징계하다.

Meaning: to have the courage or audacity to do something
Meaning_translated_KR: 무언가를 할 용기 또는 대담함을 가지다

Meaning: to have a quick look or glance at something
Meaning_translated_KR: 무언가를 잠깐 훑어보거나 흘긋 보다

Meaning: to have a great time, to thoroughly enjoy oneself
Meaning_translated_KR: 즐거운 시간을 보내다, 마음껏 즐기다

Meaning: to give something a try or attempt something
Meaning_translated_KR: 무언가를 시도하다

Meaning: to have a lot of fun
Meaning_translated_KR: 많은 재미를 느끼다

Idiom: have a bun in the oven
Meaning: to be pregnant
Meaning_translated_KR: 임신하다

Idiom: have a card up your sleeve
Meaning: to have a secret plan or advantage that can be used if needed
Meaning_translated_KR: 필요할 경우 사용할 수 있는 비밀 계획이나 장점을 가지다.

Idiom: have a chip on your shoulder
Meaning: to have a persistent feeling of resentment or anger, often from a perceived injustice or unfair treatment
Meaning_translated_KR: 지속적인 원한이나 분노를 느끼다, 종종 인식된 불공정이나 불공평한 대우로 인해

Meaning: to become very angry or upset
Meaning_translated_KR: 매우 화가 나거나 속상해지다

Meaning: to have strong romantic feelings for someone; to be infatuated with someone
Meaning_translated_KR: 누군가에게 강한 로맨틱한 감정을 가지다; 누군가에게 빠져있다

Meaning: to have a very angry or unhappy expression
Meaning_translated_KR: 매우 화가 나거나 불행해 보이는 표정을 짓다

Meaning: to consume alcoholic beverages; to drink alcohol in moderation
Meaning_translated_KR: 알코올 음료를 소비하다; 적당히 술을 마시다

Idiom: have a foot in both camps
Meaning: to be involved or associated with opposing groups or sides; to have conflicting opinions or loyalties
Meaning_translated_KR: 반대 그룹이나 측과 연관되거나 관련되다; 상충하는 의견이나 충성을 가지다

Meaning: To show compassion or kindness; to be understanding or sympathetic.
Meaning_translated_KR: 동정심이나 친절을 보이다; 이해심이나 공감능력을 가지다.

Idiom: have a leg up on somebody
Meaning: to have an advantage or be ahead of someone else
Meaning_translated_KR: 남보다 유리하다 또는 남보다 앞서 있다

Idiom: have a lot on one's plate
Meaning: to have a lot of tasks, responsibilities, or problems to deal with
Meaning_translated_KR: 처리해야 할 많은 일, 책임 또는 문제를 안고 있다.

Meaning: to face a difficult or challenging task or situation
Meaning_translated_KR: 어려운 과제나 상황에 직면하다

Meaning: to be mentally unstable or eccentric
Meaning_translated_KR: 정신적으로 불안정하거나 기이하다

Meaning: to have a fondness or affection for someone or something
Meaning_translated_KR: 누군가 또는 무언가에 대한 애정이나 사랑을 가지다

Idiom: have a tiger by the tail
Meaning: to be in a situation or have a problem that is challenging or difficult to control
Meaning_translated_KR: 어려운 상황에 처해 있거나 통제하기 힘든 문제를 가지고 있다

Idiom: have a whale of a time
Meaning: To have a great and enjoyable time; to have a lot of fun
Meaning_translated_KR: 즐겁고 재미있는 시간을 보내다; 많은 즐거움을 누리다

Meaning: to have a hidden personal agenda or motive
Meaning_translated_KR: 숨겨진 개인적인 의도나 동기를 가지다

Meaning: to have a talent or ability to recognize or appreciate something
Meaning_translated_KR: 무언가를 인식하거나 감상할 수 있는 재능이나 능력을 가지다.

Meaning: to be restless or fidgety
Meaning_translated_KR: 안절부절 못하다

Meaning: to have a lot of experience or knowledge about something
Meaning_translated_KR: 어떤 것에 대해 많은 경험이나 지식을 가지다

Meaning: to be an attentive listener or to be knowledgeable about secret or private information

Meaning: to have more important or pressing matters to attend to

Meaning: to be embarrassed or humiliated, usually due to a mistake or failure

Meaning: To be interested in or attracted to only one particular person or thing

Meaning: Have powerful or influential connections

Meaning: to want or expect to have the advantages of two things that are impossible to have together; to pursue contradictory or mutually exclusive goals or desires
Meaning_translated_KR: 두 가지를 함께 가질 수 없는 상황에서 두 가지의 장점을 원하거나 기대하다; 모순되거나 상호 배타적인 목표나 욕구를 추구하다

Meaning: to have a comfortable or effortless life, without facing many challenges or difficulties
Meaning_translated_KR: 편안하고 수월한 삶을 살다, 많은 도전이나 어려움에 직면하지 않고

Meaning: to become extremely agitated, anxious, or upset
Meaning_translated_KR: 극도로 불안해지거나, 초조해지거나, 화가 나다

Meaning: to have a lot of money and be able to spend it freely
Meaning_translated_KR: 돈이 많고 자유롭게 쓸 수 있는 상태이다.

Idiom: have never had it so good
Meaning: to be experiencing a period of great success or good fortune

Meaning: to not have the right or authority to do something

Meaning: to have no association or involvement with someone or something

Meaning: to have a misunderstanding or confusion about something

Meaning: to have other more important or pressing matters to attend to

Idiom: have someone by the short and curlies
Meaning: to have complete control or power over someone, often with the ability to manipulate or coerce them
Meaning_translated_KR: 누군가에게 완전한 통제권이나 권력을 갖고, 종종 그들을 조작하거나 강요할 수 있는 능력을 가진다.

Meaning: to have complete control or power over someone
Meaning_translated_KR: 누구에 대해 완전한 통제권이나 권력을 가지다

Meaning: to be extremely angry with someone and want to punish them severely

Meaning: to understand someone's true character, intentions, or capabilities

Idiom: have something down to a science

Meaning: to have the courage or boldness to do something

Meaning: to feel a strong physical or romantic attraction for someone

Meaning: to ultimately emerge victorious or successful, especially after initially being defeated or doubted

Meaning: having extra time available; not being busy or occupied

Meaning: to accept the consequences or face the unpleasant reality of a situation

Meaning: to have an argument or disagreement with someone

Idiom: have your head in the clouds

Meaning: to have strong romantic or infatuated feelings towards someone

Meaning: to lose control of oneself, to become extremely angry, upset, or confused

Meaning_translated_KR: 혐오감, 두려움 또는 강한 불안감을 유발하다.

Meaning_translated_KR: 연애 관계에서 성공하기 위해서는 상대방의 가족이나 가까운 사람들의 마음을 얻거나 승인을 받아야 한다는 의미의 표현

Idiom: he who laughs last laughs loudest

Idiom: he's a chip off the old block

Meaning: far superior; much better than
Meaning_translated_KR: 훨씬 우수한; ~보다 훨씬 나은

Meaning: to flee or escape quickly; to run away from a dangerous or unpleasant situation

Meaning: to feel deep sympathy or compassion for someone

Meaning: to be a kind and generous person

Meaning: honest and sincere conversation, typically about deep emotions or personal matters

Meaning: feeling sad or burdened with sorrow

Meaning: a powerful or influential person; someone who is highly skilled or successful in a particular field

Meaning: difficult or challenging circumstances; a difficult situation

Meaning: to take precautions or make alternative plans in order to reduce the risk or uncertainty of a situation

Meaning: the time of year when a particular activity, industry, or location is at its busiest or most popular

Meaning: an appropriate or suitable moment; long overdue

Meaning: an outrageously high price for something; an unfair or excessive charge

Meaning: various places or areas, both urban and rural

Meaning: an outburst of anger, frustration, or temper tantrum
Meaning_translated_KR: 분노, 좌절 또는 짜증의 폭발

Meaning: to become extremely angry or upset
Meaning_translated_KR: 극도로 화가 나거나 속상해지다

Meaning: To say or do something that is exactly right

Meaning: to leave or start a journey

Meaning: to become extremely angry or upset
Meaning_translated_KR: 극도로 화가 나거나 화가 나다

Meaning: To go to bed or sleep

Meaning: to achieve a great success or accomplishment

Meaning: to say or do something that greatly upsets or offends someone, particularly by touching on a sensitive or emotional issue

Meaning: something that is unpredictable or unreliable; often refers to a situation where success or accuracy is not guaranteed
Meaning_translated_KR: 예측할 수 없거나 신뢰할 수 없는 것; 종종 성공이나 정확성이 보장되지 않는 상황을 나타냄

Meaning: to have a strong emotional impact or resonate deeply with someone

Meaning: unpredictable or haphazard, with a high degree of chance involved
Meaning_translated_KR: 예측할 수 없거나 우발적인, 높은 확률이 수반되는

Meaning: to greatly surprise or shock someone
Meaning_translated_KR: 누군가를 크게 놀라게 하다 또는 충격을 주다

Meaning: to study or focus on academic work

Meaning: to start drinking alcohol excessively

Meaning: to become extremely angry; to lose one's temper

Meaning: to start a new job or project quickly and energetically; to immediately become fully involved and active

Meaning: to go to bed or go to sleep

Meaning: to become the focus of public attention or media coverage

Meaning: to have great success or achieve a large gain, especially financially

Meaning: to achieve or satisfy the intended goal or objective

Idiom: hit the nail on the head

Meaning: to do or say something that is exactly what is needed or desired in a particular situation

Meaning: to leave or begin a journey
Meaning_translated_KR: 여행을 떠나다 또는 시작하다

Meaning: to become very angry or upset
Meaning_translated_KR: 매우 화가 나거나 속상해지다

Meaning: to go to bed or go to sleep
Meaning_translated_KR: 잠자러 가다

Meaning: to experience a significant decline or failure

Idiom: hitch one's wagon to a star

Meaning_translated_KR: 야심 찬 목표를 위해 노력하고 성공하거나 영향력 있는 사람들과 자신을 일치시키다.

Meaning: an extremely busy or bustling place
Meaning_translated_KR: 매우 바쁘거나 분주한 장소

Meaning: to have no alternative or option; to have only one choice

Meaning: trickery or deception

Meaning: to have all the advantages or the winning position in a situation
Meaning_translated_KR: 상황에서 모든 이점이나 유리한 위치를 차지하다

Meaning: to be the center of attention; to command the respect and attention of others
Meaning_translated_KR: 주목의 중심이 되다; 다른 사람들의 존경과 주목을 받다

Meaning: to make someone responsible or answerable for something

Meaning: to guide, assist, or support someone throughout a process or task
Meaning_translated_KR: 어떤 과정이나 작업에서 누군가를 안내하거나 도움 주거나 지원하다

Meaning: to be in charge or take responsibility for something while someone is away or unavailable
Meaning_translated_KR: 누군가가 자리를 비웠거나 이용할 수 없을 때, 무언가를 맡거나 책임지는 것

Meaning: to maintain one's position or resolve, especially in the face of opposition or pressure
Meaning_translated_KR: 저항이나 압박에도 불구하고 자신의 입장이나 결심을 유지하다

Meaning: to control or have authority over the spending or finances in a household or organization
Meaning_translated_KR: 가정이나 조직의 지출이나 재정을 관리하거나 권한을 가지다

Meaning: to be in control or take charge of a situation
Meaning_translated_KR: 상황을 통제하거나 장악하다

Meaning: to remain silent or not speak
Meaning_translated_KR: 침묵을 지키다 또는 말하지 않다

Meaning: to be valid, logical, or reasonable; to withstand scrutiny or criticism
Meaning_translated_KR: 타당하다, 논리적이다, 또는 합리적이다; 비판이나 검토를 견디다

Meaning: to be patient or wait before taking action
Meaning_translated_KR: 행동하기 전에 인내하거나 기다리다

Meaning: to be able to take care of oneself or to meet the demands of a situation without relying on others
Meaning_translated_KR: 스스로를 돌보거나 다른 사람에게 의존하지 않고 상황의 요구를 충족할 수 있다

Meaning: to remain silent or refrain from speaking
Meaning_translated_KR: 침묵을 지키다 또는 말을 삼가다

Meaning: the most sacred or revered place or thing
Meaning_translated_KR: 가장 신성하거나 존경받는 장소 또는 사물

Meaning: This is an exclamation usually used to express surprise, shock, or disbelief.
Meaning_translated_KR: 이것은 보통 놀람, 충격 또는 불신을 표현하기 위해 사용되는 감탄사입니다.

Meaning: successfully completed or achieved
Meaning_translated_KR: 성공적으로 완료되거나 이루어진

Meaning: a place or environment that feels as comfortable, familiar, and welcoming as one's own home, especially when away from one's actual home
Meaning_translated_KR: 자신의 집과 같은 편안하고 친숙하며 따뜻한 느낌이 드는 장소나 환경, 특히 실제 집에서 떨어져 있을 때.

Meaning: safe or successful, often after having overcome a difficult situation
Meaning_translated_KR: 안전한 또는 성공적인, 종종 어려운 상황을 극복한 후에

Meaning: An unpleasant or uncomfortable truth about oneself or someone else
Meaning_translated_KR: 자신이나 다른 사람에 대한 불쾌하거나 불편한 진실

Meaning: both sides or parties are equal or have the same score or level of achievement
Meaning_translated_KR: 양쪽 또는 당사자들이 동등하거나 같은 점수 또는 성과 수준을 가지다.

Meaning: to completely believe or fall for something, often used to describe someone who is easily deceived
Meaning_translated_KR: 어떤 것에 완전히 믿거나 빠져들다, 종종 쉽게 속는 사람을 묘사하는 데 사용됨

Meaning: to quickly enter or join something, often a vehicle or an activity
Meaning_translated_KR: 빠르게 들어가다 또는 어떤 것에 참여하다, 종종 차량이나 활동에 참여하다

Meaning: to get into a vehicle or a place quickly and easily
Meaning_translated_KR: 차량이나 장소에 빠르고 쉽게 들어가다

Meaning: to continue to hope for something despite knowing it is unlikely to happen
Meaning_translated_KR: 일어날 가능성이 낮다는 것을 알고 있음에도 불구하고 계속해서 무언가를 희망하다

Idiom: hope for the best, but prepare for the worst
Meaning: to remain optimistic while being cautious and prepared for any possible negative outcome
Meaning_translated_KR: 어떤 가능한 부정적인 결과에 대비하면서 조심스럽고 준비된 상태에서 긍정적인 마음을 유지하다

Meaning: Something that is completely different or unrelated; a separate or distinct matter
Meaning_translated_KR: 완전히 다르거나 관련이 없는 것; 별개이거나 독립된 사안

Meaning: using the right person or thing for a particular situation or purpose
Meaning_translated_KR: 특정 상황이나 목적에 맞는 올바른 사람이나 것을 사용하는 것

Meaning: meaningless or exaggerated talk; empty promises or boasts
Meaning_translated_KR: 무의미하거나 과장된 이야기; 공허한 약속 또는 허세

Meaning: feeling flustered, agitated, or irritated
Meaning_translated_KR: 당황하거나, 초조하거나, 짜증나는 기분

Meaning: intense or passionate, typically referring to a romantic or sexual relationship
Meaning_translated_KR: 강렬한 또는 열정적인, 일반적으로 로맨틱하거나 성적인 관계를 언급할 때 사용되는

Meaning: something that is difficult or dangerous to handle; a controversial or sensitive issue
Meaning_translated_KR: 다루기 어렵거나 위험한 것; 논란이 되거나 민감한 문제

Meaning: eager or enthusiastic about something, especially in a sexual context
Meaning_translated_KR: 무언가에 대해 열망하거나 열정적인, 특히 성적인 맥락에서

Meaning: to be angry or agitated
Meaning_translated_KR: 화가 나거나 불안하다

Meaning: a person or thing that has become widely known or recognized
Meaning_translated_KR: 널리 알려지거나 인식된 사람 또는 사물

Meaning: used to express surprise, confusion, or frustration about something
Meaning_translated_KR: 무언가에 대한 놀라움, 혼란, 또는 좌절감을 표현하는 데 사용된다.

Meaning: an informal way of asking why or how something has happened
Meaning_translated_KR: 어째서 그런 일이 생겼는지 물어보는 비격식적인 방법

Meaning: how are you? or how are things going?
Meaning_translated_KR: 어떻게 지내세요? 혹은 상황은 어떻게 되어가고 있나요?

Meaning: To hesitate or be indecisive; to speak or respond slowly and uncertainly
Meaning_translated_KR: 망설이다; 느리고 불확실하게 말하거나 응답하다

Meaning: to politely disagree with someone's opinion or statement
Meaning_translated_KR: 누군가의 의견이나 주장에 정중하게 이의 제기하다

Meaning: To make a major mistake or fail at something
Meaning_translated_KR: 중대한 실수를 하다 또는 무언가에서 실패하다

Meaning: to be extremely hungry or have a large appetite
Meaning_translated_KR: 몹시 배고프다 또는 큰 식욕이 있다

Idiom: i can't be doing with it
Meaning: to have no tolerance or patience for something
Meaning_translated_KR: 무언가에 대해 인내심이나 참을성이 없다

Idiom: i can't put a name to someone
Meaning: to be unable to remember or recall someone's name
Meaning_translated_KR: 누군가의 이름을 기억하지 못하다

Meaning: to be unable to think clearly or logically
Meaning_translated_KR: 명확하게 또는 논리적으로 생각하지 못하다

Meaning: to have a strong desire or craving for something
Meaning_translated_KR: 무언가에 대한 강한 열망이나 갈망을 가지다

Meaning: to not believe or accept something as true or valid
Meaning_translated_KR: 무엇인가를 진실하거나 유효한 것으로 믿지 않거나 받아들이지 않다

Meaning: to not understand or comprehend something
Meaning_translated_KR: 무언가를 이해하지 못하다

Idiom: i had a second thought about it
Meaning: To reconsider or have doubts about a previous decision or opinion
Meaning_translated_KR: 이전의 결정이나 의견에 대해 재고하거나 의심하다

Meaning: To owe someone a favor or gratitude
Meaning_translated_KR: 누군가에게 은혜나 감사의 빚이 있다

Meaning: I'll be very surprised or amazed if something happens
Meaning_translated_KR: 무언가가 일어난다면 나는 매우 놀라거나 감동받을 것이다.

Meaning: to be ready or prepared for something
Meaning_translated_KR: 무언가에 대비하다/준비하다

Meaning: an additional benefit or pleasant surprise that enhances an already good situation
Meaning_translated_KR: 이미 좋은 상황을 더욱 향상시키는 추가적인 혜택이나 즐거운 놀라움

Idiom: idle hands are the devil's tools
Meaning: being idle or having nothing to do can lead to mischief or trouble
Meaning_translated_KR: 한가하거나 할 일이 없으면 장난이나 문제를 일으킬 수 있다.

Idiom: if it ain't broke, don't fix it
Meaning: if something is working fine as it is, there is no need to make any changes or improvements
Meaning_translated_KR: 현재 잘 작동하고 있는 것이라면, 변경이나 개선의 필요는 없다.

Idiom: if it's not one thing, it's another
Meaning: referring to a situation where one problem or difficulty is solved, only for another to immediately arise
Meaning_translated_KR: 한 가지 문제나 어려움이 해결되면 곧바로 다른 문제가 발생하는 상황을 언급하는 것

Idiom: if it's the last thing I do
Meaning: to express a strong determination to do something, even if it is the final thing one accomplishes or the very last effort one makes
Meaning_translated_KR: 무언가를 하겠다는 강한 결의를 표현하다, 비록 그것이 마지막으로 이루는 일이나 마지막 노력일지라도

Idiom: if the shoe fits, wear it
Meaning: if something said or suggested applies to you, then accept it as true, even if it is unpleasant or critical
Meaning_translated_KR: 어떤 말이나 제안이 당신에게 해당된다면, 그것이 불쾌하거나 비판적일지라도 사실로 받아들여라.

Idiom: if wishes were horses, beggars would ride
Meaning: Used to express the idea that if things could be easily achieved by wishing for them, everyone would have everything they wanted
Meaning_translated_KR: 단순히 소원으로 쉽게 이루어진다면, 모든 사람이 원하는 모든 것을 갖게 될 것이라는 생각을 표현하는 데 사용됩니다.

Meaning: to understand or perceive the hidden meaning or pattern in something; to piece together or make sense of various clues or information
Meaning_translated_KR: 뭔가의 숨겨진 의미나 패턴을 이해하거나 인식하다; 다양한 단서나 정보를 조합하여 의미를 파악하다

Idiom: if you want peace, prepare for war
Meaning: Being prepared and strong can help avoid conflict and maintain peace.
Meaning_translated_KR: 준비가 되어 있고 강한 것은 갈등을 피하고 평화를 유지하는 데 도움이 될 수 있습니다.

Meaning: to be happier not knowing certain information or truths
Meaning_translated_KR: 특정 정보나 진실을 알지 못함으로써 더 행복해지다

Meaning: money or possessions acquired dishonestly or illegally
Meaning_translated_KR: 부정직하게 또는 불법적으로 획득한 돈이나 재산

Meaning: having a problem or difficulty, typically in a situation with another person or group
Meaning_translated_KR: 다른 사람이나 그룹과의 상황에서 일반적으로 문제나 어려움을 겪고 있는 것

Meaning: used to express strong feelings of frustration, surprise, or outrage
Meaning_translated_KR: 강한 좌절감, 놀라움 또는 분노의 감정을 표현하는 데 사용됨

Meaning: experiencing difficulties or problems; in a poor or unhealthy condition
Meaning_translated_KR: 어려움이나 문제를 겪고 있는; 형편이 좋지 않거나 건강하지 않은 상태

Meaning: as a group; all together
Meaning_translated_KR: 한 그룹으로; 모두 함께

Meaning: very long time; a significant amount of time; a considerable duration
Meaning_translated_KR: 매우 오랜 시간; 상당한 양의 시간; 꽤 긴 지속 기간

Meaning: to be in a tie or very close competition where it is difficult to determine a winner
Meaning_translated_KR: 승자를 결정하기 어려운 동점이거나 매우 치열한 경쟁에 있다.

Meaning: confused or unclear about something; lacking understanding or knowledge
Meaning_translated_KR: 무언가에 대해 혼란스럽거나 불분명하다; 이해나 지식이 부족하다

Meaning: to be angry or annoyed and to leave a place in a dramatic or exaggerated manner
Meaning_translated_KR: 화가 나거나 짜증을 내며 극적으로 또는 과장된 방식으로 그 장소를 떠나다.

Meaning: to summarize something briefly or concisely
Meaning_translated_KR: 무언가를 간략하게 요약하다

Meaning: to summarize or describe something concisely
Meaning_translated_KR: 어떤 것을 간결하게 요약하거나 설명하다

Meaning: in a difficult or tricky situation
Meaning_translated_KR: 어렵고 까다로운 상황에서

Meaning: consecutively or continuously; without interruption or break
Meaning_translated_KR: 연속적으로 또는 지속적으로; 중단이나 휴식 없이

Meaning: stuck in a boring or repetitive routine; lacking excitement or change
Meaning_translated_KR: 지루하거나 반복적인 일상에 갇혀 있다; 흥미나 변화가 부족하다

Meaning: very quickly or immediately
Meaning_translated_KR: 매우 빠르게 또는 즉시

Meaning: very quickly or suddenly
Meaning_translated_KR: 매우 빠르게 또는 갑자기

Meaning: neatly organized or arranged; in perfect order or condition
Meaning_translated_KR: 깔끔하게 정리되거나 배열된; 완벽한 상태나 질서 속에 있는

Meaning: physically or mentally unhealthy or in poor condition
Meaning_translated_KR: 신체적으로나 정신적으로 건강하지 않거나 상태가 좋지 않은

Meaning: to be closely associated or involved with someone or something, often in a negative or unethical way
Meaning_translated_KR: 누군가 또는 무언가와 밀접하게 연관되거나 관련되어 있다, 종종 부정적이거나 비윤리적인 방식으로

Meaning: clearly stated or documented
Meaning_translated_KR: 명확하게 진술되거나 문서화된

Meaning: occurring or done in full view, without any attempt to hide or conceal
Meaning_translated_KR: 완전한 시야 내에서 발생하거나 이루어지며, 숨기거나 은폐하려는 시도가 없는

Meaning: actively engaged in a particular field or industry, typically with the goal of making a profit
Meaning_translated_KR: 특정 분야나 산업에 적극적으로 참여하여 일반적으로 이익을 추구하는 것

Meaning: to be in collusion or partnership with someone, usually for nefarious purposes
Meaning_translated_KR: 누군가와 공모하거나 파트너 관계를 맺다, 보통 불순한 목적을 위해서

Meaning: to be in secret collaboration or partnership with someone
Meaning_translated_KR: 누군가와 비밀리에 협력하거나 파트너십을 맺다

Meaning: without emotion or mercy; in a ruthless or calculated manner
Meaning_translated_KR: 무감정하게 또는 한치의 자비 없이; 냉혹하거나 계산된 방식으로

Meaning: in a difficult or dangerous situation; in trouble or facing serious consequences
Meaning_translated_KR: 어려운 상황에 처해있다; 곤란한 상황에 놓여있거나 심각한 결과에 직면해 있다.

Idiom: in for a penny, in for a pound
Meaning: committed to something fully, regardless of the potential risks or consequences
Meaning_translated_KR: 잠재적인 위험이나 결과에 관계없이 무언가에 완전히 헌신하다

Meaning: to be at the peak or height of an activity or event
Meaning_translated_KR: 활동이나 사건의 정점에 있다

Meaning: to be in a state of angry indignation or offense
Meaning_translated_KR: 분노한 불쾌감이나 모욕감에 빠져 있다.

Meaning: in trouble or in a difficult situation
Meaning_translated_KR: 곤란한 상황에 처해 있거나 어려운 상황에 있다

Meaning: in consideration of; taking into account; considering
Meaning_translated_KR: 고려하여; 감안하여; 생각해보면

Meaning: to be successful or quickly accepted; to be in a favorable or advantageous position
Meaning_translated_KR: 성공하다 또는 빠르게 받아들여지다; 유리하거나 유익한 위치에 있다

Meaning: being in a state of uncertainty, not knowing what will happen next, or being in a prolonged state of waiting or suspension
Meaning_translated_KR: 불확실한 상태에 있거나 다음에 무엇이 일어날지 모르고, 또는 장기간 기다리거나 중단된 상태에 있는 것.

Meaning: within the time that anyone can remember; in recent history
Meaning_translated_KR: 누구나 기억할 수 있는 시간 내에; 최근 역사에서

Meaning: according to my opinion or belief
Meaning_translated_KR: 내 의견이나 신념에 따르면

Meaning: existing or functioning in title or name only, but not in reality or substance
Meaning_translated_KR: 명목상만 존재하거나 기능하는, 그러나 실제나 본질적으로는 그렇지 않은

Meaning: very quickly or soon; without delay
Meaning_translated_KR: 매우 빨리; 지체 없이

Meaning: very clearly and explicitly; without any doubt or ambiguity
Meaning_translated_KR: 매우 분명하고 명확하게; 의심이나 애매함 없이

Idiom: in one ear and out the other
Meaning: to hear something but quickly forget or ignore it
Meaning_translated_KR: 듣기는 했지만 금방 잊어버리거나 무시하다

Meaning: to be drunk
Meaning_translated_KR: 취하다

Meaning: to explain or describe something in a simple and straightforward manner
Meaning_translated_KR: 무언가를 간단하고 명료하게 설명하다 또는 묘사하다

Meaning: under someone's control or influence; in a state of being easily manipulated or controlled by someone
Meaning_translated_KR: 누군가의 통제 또는 영향 아래에 있는; 누군가에 의해 쉽게 조종되거나 통제되는 상태에 있는

Meaning: to a great degree; in abundance
Meaning_translated_KR: 정말 많이; 풍부하게

Meaning: laughing uncontrollably
Meaning_translated_KR: 통제할 수 없이 웃다

Meaning: working together; in coordination or harmony
Meaning_translated_KR: 협력하여; 조화롭게 또는 일치하여

Meaning: speaking about or relating to X; from the perspective of X
Meaning_translated_KR: X에 대해 이야기하거나 X와 관련된; X의 관점에서

Meaning: uncertain or undecided; not settled or resolved
Meaning_translated_KR: 불확실한 또는 미결정된; 해결되지 않거나 확정되지 않은

Meaning: completely naked
Meaning_translated_KR: 완전히 벗은

Meaning: rising or becoming more powerful or influential
Meaning_translated_KR: 강해지거나 더 영향력 있게 되다

Meaning: guaranteed or certain to happen; secured
Meaning_translated_KR: 보장된, 확실한; 확보된

Meaning: approximately correct or accurate; close to the desired value or target
Meaning_translated_KR: 대략적으로 정확하거나 정확한; 원하는 값이나 목표에 근접한

Meaning: to be in excellent physical condition or health
Meaning_translated_KR: 신체적으로 훌륭한 상태이거나 건강하다

Meaning: to be profitable or financially successful
Meaning_translated_KR: 수익성이 있거나 재정적으로 성공적이다.

Idiom: in the blink of an eye
Meaning: very quickly; in a very short amount of time; almost instantaneously
Meaning_translated_KR: 매우 빠르게; 아주 짧은 시간에; 거의 즉시로

Meaning: naked or without clothing
Meaning_translated_KR: 벌거벗은 또는 옷이 없는

Meaning: to be in a secret partnership or conspiracy with someone

Meaning: someone who is cowardly or lacks courage

Meaning: the practice of giving preference or favorable treatment to one's friends or associates, typically in hiring or awarding positions or contracts

Meaning_translated_KR: 어려운 상황을 포기하거나 떠나다, 종종 더 나은 대안을 찾기 위해

Meaning: to start doing something too soon, before it is appropriate or before the necessary preparations have been made
Meaning_translated_KR: 시기나 필요한 준비가 갖추어지기 전에 무언가를 너무 일찍 시작하다.

Meaning: to go through a red traffic light without stopping
Meaning_translated_KR: 신호등에서 멈추지 않고 빨간 신호를 지나가다

Meaning: to skip ahead in a line or queue, typically without permission or consideration for others
Meaning_translated_KR: 줄 서는 곳에서 무단으로 앞서가다; 다른 사람들을 배려하지 않고 앞쪽으로 가다

Meaning: to reach a point where something becomes ridiculous, absurd, or out of touch with its original purpose or quality
Meaning_translated_KR: 어떤 것이 터무니없거나 부조리하게 되거나 원래 목적이나 품질과 동떨어진 지점에 이르다.

Meaning: to deviate from a planned course of action or to lose focus
Meaning_translated_KR: 예정된 행동 과정에서 벗어나거나 집중력을 잃다

Meaning: to go through a series of difficult or tedious tasks or requirements
Meaning_translated_KR: 일련의 어려운 또는 지루한 작업이나 요구 사항을 겪다

Meaning: to form an opinion or make a judgment without having all the facts or information
Meaning_translated_KR: 모든 사실이나 정보가 없이 의견을 형성하거나 판단을 내리다

Meaning: the decision or conclusion has not been reached or is still uncertain
Meaning_translated_KR: 결정이나 결론이 아직 내리지 않았거나 여전히 불확실하다

Meaning: getting what one deserves, especially when it is negative
Meaning_translated_KR: 자기가 마땅히 받아야 할 것을 얻는 것, 특히 그것이 부정적일 때

Meaning: as a precaution or in anticipation of a future event or circumstance
Meaning_translated_KR: 예방 차원에서 또는 미래의 사건이나 상황을 대비하여

Meaning: exactly what is needed or desired in a particular situation
Meaning_translated_KR: 특정 상황에서 정확히 필요하거나 원하는 것

Meaning: an unfair or biased court or trial, often with a predetermined outcome
Meaning_translated_KR: 불공정하거나 편향된 법원이나 재판, 종종 미리 정해진 결과를 가진

Meaning: to be very eager or enthusiastic about something
Meaning_translated_KR: 무언가에 대해 매우 열망하거나 열정적이다

Meaning: remain calm or composed
Meaning_translated_KR: 차분하거나 침착하게 유지하다

Meaning: to watch or monitor closely and attentively
Meaning_translated_KR: 면밀히 주시하다

Meaning: to remain vigilant or watchful
Meaning_translated_KR: 경계를 유지하다 or 주의 깊게 지켜보다

Meaning: to remain alert and watchful
Meaning_translated_KR: 경계심을 유지하다

Meaning: to manage to survive or stay out of debt, especially with difficulty
Meaning_translated_KR: 어렵게 겨우 살아남다 또는 빚을 지지 않다

Meaning: to have enough money to avoid hunger or poverty
Meaning_translated_KR: 배고픔이나 가난을 피할 수 있을 만큼 충분한 돈을 가지다

Meaning: to speak in a polite and respectful manner; to refrain from using offensive or rude language
Meaning_translated_KR: 공손하고 존경하는 방식으로 말하다; 공격적이거나 무례한 언어 사용을 삼가다

Meaning: to keep something secret or hidden; to maintain control or restraint over something
Meaning_translated_KR: 무언가를 비밀스럽게 유지하다; 어떤 것에 대한 통제나 제한을 유지하다

Meaning: to avoid attracting attention or being noticed, typically in order to avoid trouble or unwanted attention
Meaning_translated_KR: 주의를 끌거나 눈에 띄지 않도록 피하다, 일반적으로 문제나 원하지 않는 주의를 피하기 위해서

Meaning: to maintain a serious or composed expression, especially in a humorous or difficult situation
Meaning_translated_KR: 웃기거나 어려운 상황에서도 진지하거나 침착한 표정을 유지하다

Meaning: to watch or monitor something or someone closely
Meaning_translated_KR: 무엇인가 또는 누군가를 면밀히 지켜보거나 감시하다

Meaning: To maintain distance or avoid close involvement or contact with someone or something
Meaning_translated_KR: 누군가 또는 무언가와 가까운 관계를 피하거나 접촉을 멀리하다

Meaning: to keep something or someone at a distance or under control; to prevent something from happening or getting closer
Meaning_translated_KR: 무언가 또는 누구인가를 거리 두거나 통제하다; 무언가가 발생하거나 가까워지는 것을 방지하다

Meaning: To earn enough money to live and survive
Meaning_translated_KR: 생존하고 생활하는 데 충분한 돈을 벌다

Meaning: to maintain contact or communication with someone; to stay connected or updated with someone
Meaning_translated_KR: 누군가와 연락을 유지하다; 누군가와 연결되어 있거나 최신 정보를 유지하다

Meaning: to keep someone informed or involved in a particular situation or project
Meaning_translated_KR: 어떤 상황이나 프로젝트에 대해 누군가를 계속 알려주거나 참여시키다

Meaning: to remain silent, not reveal information, or keep a secret
Meaning_translated_KR: 침묵을 지키다, 정보를 드러내지 않다, 또는 비밀을 유지하다

Meaning: to continue moving forward; to persevere; to keep going
Meaning_translated_KR: 계속 나아가다; 인내하다; 계속 진행하다

Idiom: keep one's eye on the ball
Meaning: to stay focused and attentive to the task at hand
Meaning_translated_KR: 현재의 작업에 집중하고 주의를 기울이다

Meaning: to stay alert and watchful; to be vigilant
Meaning_translated_KR: 경계를 늦추지 않고 주의 깊게 지켜보다; 경계하다

Meaning: to be vigilant or watchful
Meaning_translated_KR: 경계를 하다 또는 조심하다

Meaning: to remain silent or keep quiet; to not speak or reveal information
Meaning_translated_KR: 침묵을 지키다; 말을 하지 않거나 정보를 드러내지 않다

Meaning: to make somebody laugh uncontrollably
Meaning_translated_KR: 누군가를 통제할 수 없을 정도로 웃게 만들다

Meaning: to intentionally withhold information from someone
Meaning_translated_KR: 누군가에게 정보를 고의로 withholding하다

Meaning: To keep someone informed or updated about a situation or information
Meaning_translated_KR: 누군가를 상황이나 정보에 대해 알려주다 / 최신 상태로 유지하다

Meaning: to monitor or keep a watchful eye on someone or something
Meaning_translated_KR: 누군가 또는 무언가를 모니터링하거나 주의 깊게 지켜보다

Meaning: to maintain a state of harmony or prevent conflict
Meaning_translated_KR: 조화로운 상태를 유지하다 또는 갈등을 예방하다

Idiom: keep the wolf from the door
Meaning: to have enough money or resources to prevent hunger or poverty
Meaning_translated_KR: 굶주림이나 빈곤을 예방할 수 있는 충분한 돈이나 자원을 가지다

Meaning: to maintain a façade or pretend to be of a certain status or condition, often despite underlying problems or difficulties
Meaning_translated_KR: 겉모습을 유지하거나 특정한 지위나 상태인 척하다, 종종 근본적인 문제나 어려움에도 불구하고

Meaning: to continue doing well in your current efforts or performance
Meaning_translated_KR: 현재의 노력이나 성과를 계속 잘 유지하다

Meaning: to strive to match or exceed the lifestyle or possessions of one's neighbors or peers
Meaning_translated_KR: 이웃이나 또래의 생활 방식이나 소유물에 맞추거나 이를 초과하려고 애쓰다

Meaning: to remain optimistic or cheerful in a difficult or challenging situation
Meaning_translated_KR: 어렵거나 도전적인 상황에서도 긍정적이거나 쾌활하게 남아 있다.

Meaning: to remain calm and composed, especially in a challenging or stressful situation
Meaning_translated_KR: 특히 도전적이거나 스트레스를 주는 상황에서 차분하고 침착하게 유지하다

Idiom: keep your eye on the ball
Meaning: to stay focused and attentive; to remain aware and attentive to important details or tasks
Meaning_translated_KR: 집중하고 주의 깊게 지내다; 중요한 세부 사항이나 작업에 대해 인식하고 주의 깊게 유지하다

Meaning: to stay vigilant or alert, to pay close attention to one's surroundings
Meaning_translated_KR: 경계를 유지하다, 주변 상황에 세밀하게 주의를 기울이다

Meaning: to hope for good luck or success, often while facing uncertainty or adversity
Meaning_translated_KR: 불확실성이나 역경에 직면하면서 좋은 운이나 성공을 바라는 것

Idiom: keep your friends close and your enemies closer
Meaning: Be vigilant and maintain a close watch on people who may pose a threat to you, as they may be harder to defeat if you underestimate them.
Meaning_translated_KR: 위험을 초래할 수 있는 사람들에 대해 경계하고 면밀히 주시하라. 그들을 과소평가할 경우, 그들을 이기기가 더 어려울 수 있다.

Meaning: to remain calm or composed
Meaning_translated_KR: 차분하거나 침착하게 유지하다

Meaning: to remain calm and think clearly, especially in a difficult or stressful situation
Meaning_translated_KR: 어려운 상황이나 스트레스가 많은 상황에서도 침착함을 유지하고 명확하게 생각하다

Meaning: to manage to cope with a difficult situation, especially when you have financial problems, or too much work
Meaning_translated_KR: 어려운 상황에 대처해 나가다, 특히 재정 문제나 과도한 업무가 있을 때

Meaning: to stay out of trouble; to avoid doing anything wrong or illegal
Meaning_translated_KR: 문제에서 벗어나다; 잘못되거나 불법적인 일을 피하다

Idiom: keep your nose to the grindstone
Meaning: to work hard and diligently; to stay focused on tasks and not be easily distracted
Meaning_translated_KR: 열심히 근면히 일하다; 작업에 집중하고 쉽게 산만해지지 않다

Meaning: to not commit to a specific course of action, leaving possibilities available
Meaning_translated_KR: 특정한 행동 방침에 약속하지 않고 가능성을 열어두다.

Meaning: keep your spirits up; stay positive
Meaning_translated_KR: 기운을 내세요; 긍정적인 자세를 유지하세요.

Meaning: to be prepared and ready for a future opportunity or event; to exercise caution and restraint in order to protect oneself
Meaning_translated_KR: 미래의 기회나 사건에 대비하고 준비하다; 자신을 보호하기 위해 주의와 절제를 기하다

Meaning: hoping for good luck or a positive outcome
Meaning_translated_KR: 좋은 운이나 긍정적인 결과를 바라다

Meaning: to hope for good luck or success for oneself or someone else
Meaning_translated_KR: 자신이나 누군가를 위해 행운이나 성공을 바라다

Meaning: to go bankrupt or suffer a major financial loss
Meaning_translated_KR: 파산하다 또는 큰 재정적 손실을 겪다

Meaning: to die or pass away
Meaning_translated_KR: 죽다 또는 세상을 떠나다

Meaning: to resist or object to authority, rules, or constraints, often resulting in difficulties or setbacks
Meaning_translated_KR: 권위, 규칙 또는 제약에 저항하거나 반대하여 종종 어려움이나 좌절을 초래하다.

Meaning: to strongly and effectively confront or overcome a challenge or obstacle; to achieve success or victory in an impressive or forceful manner
Meaning_translated_KR: 강력하고 효과적으로 도전이나 장애물에 맞서다; 인상적이고 강력한 방식으로 성공이나 승리를 이루다

Meaning: to rebel or break free from established rules or expectations
Meaning_translated_KR: 수립된 규칙이나 기대에서 반란을 일으키거나 벗어나다

Meaning: to die
Meaning_translated_KR: 죽다

Idiom: kick the can down the road
Meaning: to postpone a decision or action, especially in a way that shifts the responsibility to someone else or to the future
Meaning_translated_KR: 결정을 미루거나 행동을 연기하다, 특히 그 책임을 다른 사람이나 미래로 전가하는 방식으로

Meaning: to stop a bad or unhealthy habit
Meaning_translated_KR: 나쁜 습관이나 건강에 해로운 습관을 끊다

Meaning: to make a big commotion or protest about something
Meaning_translated_KR: 무언가에 대해 큰 소란이나 항의를 일으키다

Meaning: to create a commotion or uproar; to make a big fuss about something
Meaning_translated_KR: 소동을 피우다; 무언가에 대해 큰 소란을 일으키다

Meaning: To enjoy oneself, often by engaging in lively or boisterous behavior
Meaning_translated_KR: 즐겁게 지내다, 종종 활기차거나 시끄러운 행동을 하면서

Meaning: reluctantly or with resistance
Meaning_translated_KR: 마지못해 또는 저항하며

Meaning: to celebrate extravagantly, especially after a long absence
Meaning_translated_KR: 특히 오랜 결혼 후에 호화롭게 축하하다

Idiom: kill the goose that lays the golden egg
Meaning: to destroy a valuable or profitable resource out of greed or short-sightedness
Meaning_translated_KR: 탐욕이나 단기적 관점으로 인해 귀중하거나 수익성 있는 자원을 파괴하다

Idiom: kill the goose that lays the golden eggs
Meaning: to destroy a valuable or beneficial resource or opportunity in pursuit of immediate gain
Meaning_translated_KR: 즉각적인 이익을 추구하는 과정에서 귀중한 자원이나 기회를 파괴하다

Meaning: To occupy oneself with an activity to pass the time, especially when waiting for something or someone
Meaning_translated_KR: 무언가 또는 누군가를 기다릴 때 시간을 보내기 위해 활동에 몰두하다

Idiom: kill two birds with one stone
Meaning: to accomplish two tasks or objectives with a single effort or action
Meaning_translated_KR: 한 번의 노력이나 행동으로 두 가지 과제나 목표를 달성하다

Meaning: referring to a lion as the most powerful or dominant animal in a group of animals
Meaning_translated_KR: 사자라는 동물을 동물들 중에서 가장 강력하거나 우세한 동물로 언급하기

Meaning: to reconcile or resolve a disagreement or conflict
Meaning_translated_KR: 갈등이나 의견 차이를 조정하거나 해결하다

Meaning: to reveal intimate or private information, especially about a romantic or sexual relationship, often for personal gain or to sensationalize
Meaning_translated_KR: 특히 개인적인 이익이나 선동을 위해 로맨틱하거나 성적인 관계에 대한 친밀한 또는 개인적인 정보를 드러내다.

Meaning: to excessively flatter or try to please someone in order to gain favor or advantage
Meaning_translated_KR: 지나치게 아부하거나 누군가를 기쁘게 하여 호의나 이점을 얻으려 하다

Meaning: an action or event that causes a person or thing to fail or die
Meaning_translated_KR: 사람이나 사물이 실패하거나 죽게 만드는 행동이나 사건

Meaning: to give someone or something a second chance or revive them from a dire situation
Meaning_translated_KR: 누군가 또는 무엇인가에 두 번째 기회를 주다 또는 심각한 상황에서 되살리다

Meaning: someone who is closely related or closely connected, often in a way that is slightly suspicious or not entirely appropriate
Meaning_translated_KR: 밀접하게 관련되거나 연결된 사람, 종종 약간 의심스럽거나 전적으로 적절하지 않은 방식으로

Meaning: one's friends and family; one's close and familiar relationships
Meaning_translated_KR: 친구와 가족; 가까운 관계와 친숙한 인간관계

Meaning: an immediate and automatic response, often without careful thought or consideration
Meaning_translated_KR: 즉각적이고 자동적인 반응, 종종 신중한 생각이나 고려 없이

Meaning: an informal sexual encounter
Meaning_translated_KR: 비공식적인 성적 만남

Meaning: someone who comes to the rescue or provides assistance, especially in a chivalrous and heroic manner
Meaning_translated_KR: 구조하러 오거나 도움을 주는 사람, 특히 기사도적이고 영웅적인 방식으로.

Meaning: to furrow or wrinkle one's forehead, often indicating deep concentration, confusion, or concern
Meaning_translated_KR: 이마를 찌푸리다; 깊은 집중, 혼란 또는 걱정을 나타내는 경우가 많다.

Meaning: to stop doing something or to stop bothering someone
Meaning_translated_KR: 무언가를 중단하다 또는 누군가를 귀찮게 하는 것을 그만두다

Meaning: To hope that something will not happen or to bring good luck by touching or knocking on something wooden
Meaning_translated_KR: 어떤 일이 발생하지 않기를 바라거나, 나무에 손을 대거나 두드려서 좋은 운을 가져오기를 바라는 것

Meaning: To hope that something will happen as planned or to bring good luck, often by touching or knocking on wood to avoid tempting fate.
Meaning_translated_KR: 일이 계획대로 잘 되기를 바라거나 좋은 운을 가져다주기를 바라며, 운명을 재촉하지 않기 위해 나무를 만지거나 두드리는 행위.

Meaning: to greatly impress or astound someone
Meaning_translated_KR: 누군가에게 깊은 인상을 주다 또는 놀라게 하다

Meaning: to defeat or overcome someone or something with great force or impact
Meaning_translated_KR: 누군가 또는 무언가를 강력한 힘이나 영향으로 이기다 또는 극복하다

Meaning: to punch or hit someone very hard
Meaning_translated_KR: 누군가를 매우 세게 때리다

Meaning: To greatly impress or amaze someone
Meaning_translated_KR: 누군가를 깊은 인상이나 놀라움으로 사로잡다

Meaning: to be experienced or knowledgeable about a particular task, job, or situation
Meaning_translated_KR: 특정 작업, 직업 또는 상황에 대한 경험이 많거나 지식이 풍부하다

Meaning: to have no limits or boundaries; to be limitless or boundless
Meaning_translated_KR: 제한이 없거나 경계가 없다; 무한하거나 제한이 없다

Meaning: to be extremely knowledgeable or familiar with something, to know every aspect or detail of it
Meaning_translated_KR: 어떤 것에 대해 극도로 잘 알고 있거나 친숙하다; 그것의 모든 측면이나 세부 사항을 알고 있다

Meaning: To be very familiar with something, to know it very well.
Meaning_translated_KR: 무언가에 대해 매우 익숙하다, 그것을 잘 알다.

Meaning: to be familiar with the procedures, rules, or details of a particular situation or task
Meaning_translated_KR: 특정 상황이나 작업의 절차, 규칙 또는 세부 사항에 익숙하다

Meaning: to understand the situation or be aware of the important details
Meaning_translated_KR: 상황을 이해하거나 중요한 세부 사항을 인식하다

Idiom: know which way the wind is blowing
Meaning: to understand the current trends, opinions, or circumstances in order to be able to act appropriately or make advantageous decisions
Meaning_translated_KR: 현재의 트렌드, 의견 또는 상황을 이해하여 적절하게 행동하거나 유리한 결정을 내릴 수 있도록 하다.

Meaning: work done for personal enjoyment or fulfillment rather than for payment or recognition
Meaning_translated_KR: 보수나 인정을 받기보다는 개인적인 즐거움이나 충족을 위해 하는 작업

Meaning: doing something out of passion, interest, or love, rather than for personal gain or reward
Meaning_translated_KR: 개인적인 이득이나 보상보다는 열정, 관심 또는 사랑으로 무언가를 하다

Meaning: an elected official who is nearing the end of their term and therefore has less influence or power
Meaning_translated_KR: 임기가 끝나가는 선출직 공무원으로, 따라서 영향력이나 권력이 줄어든 사람

Meaning: to be asleep or in a state of sleep
Meaning_translated_KR: 잠들어 있거나 수면 상태에 있다

Meaning: exaggerated or extraordinary in character, appearance, or significance
Meaning_translated_KR: 과장되거나 특별한 성격, 외모 또는 중요성을 지닌

Meaning: to emphasize the importance of something or someone that is mentioned last
Meaning_translated_KR: 마지막에 언급된 것 또는 누군가의 중요성을 강조하다

Meaning: the final or last effort or opportunity to do something
Meaning_translated_KR: 무언가를 할 수 있는 마지막 노력 또는 기회

Meaning: referring to a past event or situation that was difficult or unpleasant
Meaning_translated_KR: 어려웠거나 불pleasant했던 과거의 사건이나 상황을 언급하는 것

Idiom: laugh all the way to the bank
Meaning: to be very pleased or satisfied with the amount of money one has earned or gained, often despite others thinking it is undeserved or unlikely
Meaning_translated_KR: 주변 사람들이 부당하거나 불가능하다고 생각함에도 불구하고 자신이 벌거나 얻은 금액에 매우 만족하거나 기뻐하다

Meaning: To laugh very loudly and uncontrollably
Meaning_translated_KR: 매우 크게 uncontrollably 웃다

Meaning: to have a secret plan or advantage
Meaning_translated_KR: 비밀 계획이나 이점을 가지다

Meaning: to secretly find amusement or satisfaction in someone else's misfortune
Meaning_translated_KR: 누군가의 불행에서 비밀스럽게 즐거움이나 만족을 찾다

Meaning: someone or something that becomes an object of ridicule or mockery
Meaning_translated_KR: 조롱이나 비웃음의 대상이 되는 사람이나 것

Meaning: laughter and humor can have a positive and healing effect on a person's physical and emotional well-being
Meaning_translated_KR: 웃음과 유머는 한 사람의 신체적, 정서적 안녕에 긍정적이고 치유적인 영향을 미칠 수 있다.

Meaning: the principle that those who are strong and aggressive will succeed, while those who are weak will fail
Meaning_translated_KR: 강하고 공격적인 사람들이 성공하고, 약한 사람들이 실패한다는 원칙

Meaning: the principle of survival of the fittest; a situation of fierce competition and chaos where only the strongest or most cunning survive
Meaning_translated_KR: 적자생존의 원리; 가장 강하거나 가장 교활한 자만이 살아남는 치열한 경쟁과 혼란의 상황

Meaning: to act independently and disregard rules or laws
Meaning_translated_KR: 독립적으로 행동하고 규칙이나 법을 무시하다

Meaning: to touch or harm someone
Meaning_translated_KR: 누군가를 만지거나 해를 끼치다

Meaning: to fail or perform poorly
Meaning_translated_KR: 실패하다 또는 성과가 나쁘다

Meaning: to establish rules or regulations and ensure they are followed
Meaning_translated_KR: 규칙이나 규정을 제정하고 이를 준수하도록 보장하다

Meaning: to assert one's authority or establish rules and expectations
Meaning_translated_KR: 자신의 권위를 주장하거나 규칙과 기대를 설정하다

Meaning: to see or behold someone or something for the first time
Meaning_translated_KR: 누군가 또는 무언가를 처음으로 보다

Meaning: to make a prediction or estimation about the likelihood or outcome of something
Meaning_translated_KR: 무엇에 대한 가능성이나 결과에 대한 예측 또는 추정을 하다.

Idiom: lead someone up the garden path
Meaning: to deceive or mislead someone
Meaning_translated_KR: 누군가를 속이거나 잘못 인도하다

Meaning: have a tendency or inclination towards something; to prefer or be more likely to choose something
Meaning_translated_KR: 무언가에 대한 경향이나 성향이 있다; 무언가를 선호하거나 선택할 가능성이 더 높다

Meaning: to memorize something completely or thoroughly
Meaning_translated_KR: 무언가를 완전히 또는 철저히 외우다

Meaning: the rate of progress in gaining new knowledge or skills
Meaning_translated_KR: 새로운 지식이나 기술을 습득하는 진전 비율

Meaning: to leave one's familiar or comfortable surroundings and become independent; to move out of one's parents' home and start living on one's own
Meaning_translated_KR: 익숙하거나 편안한 환경을 떠나 독립하다; 부모님의 집을 나와 홀로 살기 시작하다

Meaning: to cancel or break off a planned wedding or commitment at the last minute
Meaning_translated_KR: 결혼식이나 약속을 막바지에 취소하다.

Meaning: to search or investigate every possible option or avenue
Meaning_translated_KR: 모든 가능한 옵션이나 경로를 조사하거나 탐색하다

Meaning: to abandon, betray, or leave someone in a difficult or challenging situation without any assistance or support
Meaning_translated_KR: 누군가를 버리다, 배신하다, 또는 어려운 상황에서 도움이나 지원 없이 떠나다

Meaning: to move out of one's childhood home or original living situation and become independent
Meaning_translated_KR: 어린 시절 집이나 원래 살던 곳에서 나와 독립하다

Meaning: to not interfere with or try to improve something that is already satisfactory
Meaning_translated_KR: 이미 만족스러운 것에 간섭하거나 개선하려고 하지 않다

Meaning: everywhere; abundantly; frequently
Meaning_translated_KR: 어디에나; 풍부하게; 자주

Meaning: to run or walk quickly, often to escape from a situation or to get somewhere in a hurry
Meaning_translated_KR: 상황에서 탈출하거나 급히 어딘가에 가기 위해 빠르게 달리거나 걷다

Meaning: to help or offer assistance
Meaning_translated_KR: 도움을 주다 또는 지원을 제공하다

Meaning: to listen attentively or sympathetically
Meaning_translated_KR: 주심을 기울여 듣다 또는 공감하여 듣다

Meaning: to listen attentively
Meaning_translated_KR: 귀 기울여 듣다

Meaning: to make a decision or act based on feelings or emotions rather than logical thinking
Meaning_translated_KR: 감정이나 느낌에 기반하여 결정하거나 행동하다, 논리적 사고보다는

Meaning: to forgive or forget about past issues or disagreements
Meaning_translated_KR: 과거의 문제나 불화를 용서하거나 잊다

Idiom: let me put it this way
Meaning: Let me explain it in a different or simpler manner
Meaning_translated_KR: 조금 더 간단하게 설명해볼게요.

Meaning: to avoid interfering in a situation in order to prevent trouble or conflict
Meaning_translated_KR: 문제나 갈등을 피하기 위해 상황에 개입하지 않다.

Meaning: To break bad news or disappoint someone in a kind or considerate manner
Meaning_translated_KR: 부정적인 소식을 전하거나 누군가를 실망시키되 친절하거나 배려하는 방식으로 전달하다.

Meaning: to not hold someone accountable or responsible for something; to release someone from punishment or obligation
Meaning_translated_KR: 누군가에게 무엇에 대한 책임이나 의무를 묻지 않다; 누군가를 처벌이나 의무에서 면제하다

Idiom: let the cat out of the bag
Meaning: to reveal a secret or disclose information that was intended to be kept secret
Meaning_translated_KR: 비밀을 드러내다 또는 비밀로 유지하려던 정보를 공개하다

Idiom: let the genie out of the bottle
Meaning: to do something that cannot be reversed; to reveal or unleash something powerful or uncontrollable
Meaning_translated_KR: 되돌릴 수 없는 일을 하다; 강력하거나 통제할 수 없는 것을 드러내거나 발산하다

Meaning: to relax and be yourself; to behave in an uninhibited or carefree manner
Meaning_translated_KR: 편안하게 자신을 표현하다; 거리낌 없이 또는 걱정 없이 행동하다

Idiom: let your heart rule your head
Meaning: to make decisions or act based on emotions or feelings, rather than rational thinking
Meaning_translated_KR: 감정이나 기분에 근거하여 결정을 내리거나 행동하다, 합리적 사고보다는

Meaning: "let's get started" or "come on, get moving"
Meaning_translated_KR: "시작하자" 또는 "자, 움직이자"

Meaning: let's start over or go back to a previous point in time or a previous situation
Meaning_translated_KR: 다시 시작하자 혹은 이전 시점이나 상황으로 돌아가자.

Meaning: fair and equal opportunity for all
Meaning_translated_KR: 모두에게 공정하고 평등한 기회

Meaning: a business or investment opportunity that yields significant profits with little effort or risk
Meaning_translated_KR: 작은 노력이나 위험으로 상당한 이익을 가져다주는 사업 또는 투자 기회

Meaning: to behave submissively or obsequiously towards someone in order to gain their favor or approval
Meaning_translated_KR: 누군가의 호의나 승인을 얻기 위해 복종하거나 아첨하는 행동을 하다

Meaning: to lie or deceive someone convincingly and without remorse
Meaning_translated_KR: 누군가에게 설득력 있게 그리고 양심의 가책 없이 거짓말하거나 속이다.

Meaning: to keep a low profile; to stay out of sight or avoid attention
Meaning_translated_KR: 나서지 않다; 눈에 띄지 않거나 주목을 피하다

Meaning: to lie or deceive someone without any remorse or hesitation; to lie blatantly
Meaning_translated_KR: 주저하거나 반성 없이 누군가에게 거짓말을 하다; 노골적으로 거짓말하다

Meaning: to risk one's life and physical well-being
Meaning_translated_KR: 생명과 신체의 안전을 위험에 빠뜨리다

Meaning: to reveal or expose something, especially information or a hidden truth
Meaning_translated_KR: 무언가를 드러내거나 폭로하다, 특히 정보나 숨겨진 진실을.

Meaning: to make an effort or take action, especially in helping or doing something
Meaning_translated_KR: 노력하다 혹은 행동하다, 특히 도움을 주거나 무언가를 하는 데 있어

Meaning: to reveal or show something that was previously hidden or secret
Meaning_translated_KR: 이전에 숨겨져 있거나 비밀이었던 것을 드러내거나 보여주다

Idiom: light at the end of the tunnel
Meaning: hope or relief, especially after a long and difficult time or situation
Meaning_translated_KR: 오랜 시간이나 어려운 상황 후의 희망이나 안도감

Meaning: a superficial or promiscuous woman
Meaning_translated_KR: 경박하거나 문란한 여성

Idiom: like a bat out of hell
Meaning: to move or act very quickly or recklessly
Meaning_translated_KR: 매우 빠르거나 무모하게 움직이거나 행동하다

Idiom: like a bear with a sore head
Meaning: to be in a very bad mood or irritable
Meaning_translated_KR: 매우 기분이 나쁘거나 짜증스러운 상태이다.

Idiom: like a chicken with its head cut off
Meaning: to behave in a frantic, disorganized, or aimless manner
Meaning_translated_KR: 몹시 혼란스럽고 비정상적이며 목적 없이 행동하다

Idiom: like a hole in the head
Meaning: an unwanted or unnecessary thing or situation; something that is not needed or desired
Meaning_translated_KR: 원하지 않거나 불필요한 것 또는 상황; 필요 없거나 바람직하지 않은 것

Meaning: completely different or incompatible
Meaning_translated_KR: 완전히 다르거나 호환되지 않는

Meaning: occurs regularly and predictably, without any issues or interruptions
Meaning_translated_KR: 정기적으로 예측 가능하게, 문제나 중단 없이 발생하다.

Meaning: Children often resemble their parents in appearance, behavior, or character.
Meaning_translated_KR: 아이들은 종종 외모, 행동 또는 성격에서 부모를 닮습니다.

Meaning: to indicate that a person or child takes after their parent or exhibits similar characteristics or behavior
Meaning_translated_KR: 어떤 사람이나 아이가 부모를 닮았다거나 유사한 특성이나 행동을 보여준다는 것을 나타내다.

Meaning: The traits or behaviors of a mother are also seen in her daughter
Meaning_translated_KR: 어머니의 특성이나 행동은 딸에게서도 나타난다.

Meaning: very similar, alike, or identical
Meaning_translated_KR: 매우 유사한, 비슷한, 또는 동일한

Meaning: something that you can do easily or effortlessly, even after a long period of not doing it
Meaning_translated_KR: 오랫동안 하지 않더라도 쉽게 또는 수월하게 할 수 있는 것

Meaning: to do something quickly or energetically
Meaning_translated_KR: 무언가를 신속하게 또는 에너지 있게 하다

Idiom: like two peas in a pod
Meaning: to be very similar or identical in appearance or character
Meaning_translated_KR: 외모나 성격이 매우 유사하거나 동일하다.

Idiom: like water off a duck's back
Meaning: having no effect or influence on someone
Meaning_translated_KR: 누군가에게 영향이나 효과가 없는

Meaning: a website or group of websites that exist solely to increase the number of hyperlinks pointing to a particular website, with the aim of improving the website's search engine ranking
Meaning_translated_KR: 특정 웹사이트의 검색 엔진 순위를 높이기 위해 단순히 해당 웹사이트로 향하는 하이퍼링크의 수를 늘리기 위해 존재하는 웹사이트 또는 웹사이트 그룹

Meaning: the phenomenon of hyperlinks on the internet becoming invalid or broken over time
Meaning_translated_KR: 시간이 지남에 따라 인터넷의 하이퍼링크가 무효화되거나 끊어지는 현상

Meaning: the largest or greatest portion or part of something
Meaning_translated_KR: 무언가의 가장 큰 부분 또는 대부분

Meaning: to consume alcoholic beverages, often in excess
Meaning_translated_KR: 알코올 음료를 소비하다, 종종 과도하게 마시다

Meaning: mischievous or teasing person
Meaning_translated_KR: 장난꾸러기 또는 괴롭히는 사람

Idiom: little fish in a big pond
Meaning: feeling insignificant or unimportant in a large or competitive environment
Meaning_translated_KR: 대규모나 경쟁적인 환경에서 사소하거나 중요하지 않다고 느끼다

Meaning: to pretend or deceive oneself and others about one's true identity or situation
Meaning_translated_KR: 자신의 진짜 정체성이나 상황에 대해 자신과 타인을 속이거나 가장하다

Meaning: to gain knowledge or understanding through experience or mistakes
Meaning_translated_KR: 경험이나 실수를 통해 지식이나 이해를 얻다

Meaning: to accept differences and allow others to live their lives as they choose
Meaning_translated_KR: 차이를 수용하고 다른 사람들이 그들이 선택한 대로 살도록 허용하다

Meaning: to live together as a couple without being married
Meaning_translated_KR: 결혼하지 않고 함께 살다

Meaning: to enjoy oneself to the fullest; to have a good time; to live in a luxurious or extravagant way
Meaning_translated_KR: 최고로 즐기다; 좋은 시간을 보내다; 사치스럽거나 호화롭게 살다

Meaning: to be living or continuing to exist beyond the expected or usual time of death or termination
Meaning_translated_KR: 예상되거나 일반적인 사망이나 종료 시점을 넘어서 살아 있거나 계속 존재하다

Meaning: an energetic, lively, or dynamic person
Meaning_translated_KR: 에너지 넘치고 활기차거나 역동적인 사람

Meaning: "money" or "income"
Meaning_translated_KR: "돈" 또는 "소득"

Meaning: to prepare oneself for a battle or challenge, often by loading a firearm or mentally steeling oneself for action
Meaning_translated_KR: 전투나 도전에 대비하다, 종종 총기를 장전하거나 행동을 위해 마음을 단단히 먹는 방식으로

Meaning: to engage in a heated argument or dispute; to clash or disagree strongly with someone
Meaning_translated_KR: 격렬한 논쟁이나 다툼에 참여하다; 누군가와 강하게 충돌하거나 의견이 다르다

Idiom: lock the stable door after the horse has bolted
Meaning: to take precautions or preventive measures after damage has already been done
Meaning_translated_KR: 피해가 발생한 후에 예방 조치를 취하다

Meaning: an individual who prefers to do things alone and does not actively seek or enjoy the company or help of others
Meaning_translated_KR: 혼자 하는 것을 선호하며 다른 사람의 도움이나 함께하는 것을 적극적으로 찾거나 즐기지 않는 개인

Meaning: old or aged
Meaning_translated_KR: 늙은 또는 노령의

Meaning: the future or ultimate outcome of a situation or decision, especially when considering its long-term effects
Meaning_translated_KR: 상황이나 결정의 미래 또는 최종 결과, 특히 장기적인 영향을 고려할 때

Meaning: used to greet someone whom one has not seen in a long time
Meaning_translated_KR: 오랜만에 만나는 사람에게 인사할 때 사용되는 표현

Meaning: to think about the possible consequences or dangers before taking action
Meaning_translated_KR: 행동을 취하기 전에 가능한 결과나 위험에 대해 생각하다

Meaning: to anticipate or be excited about something that is going to happen in the future
Meaning_translated_KR: 앞으로 일어날 일에 대해 기대하거나 흥분하다.

Idiom: look like mutton dressed as lamb
Meaning: to look older or inappropriate in one's appearance or clothing
Meaning_translated_KR: 외모나 옷차림이 나이를 더 들어 보이게 하거나 부적절하게 보이게 하다

Meaning: to focus on the positive aspects of a situation; to be optimistic
Meaning_translated_KR: 상황의 긍정적인 측면에 집중하다; 낙관적이다

Meaning: to ignore or overlook something, especially something wrong or suspicious
Meaning_translated_KR: 무시하다 또는 간과하다, 특히 잘못되거나 의심스러운 것을

Meaning: To have the appearance or characteristics necessary for a particular role or situation
Meaning_translated_KR: 특정 역할이나 상황에 필요한 외모나 특성을 가지다

Meaning: an unpredictable or reckless person who can cause damage or harm
Meaning_translated_KR: 예측할 수 없거나 무모한 사람으로, 피해나 해를 끼칠 수 있는 사람

Meaning: a pompous or overbearing man
Meaning_translated_KR: 거만하거나 뽐내는 남자

Meaning: to become very angry or lose control of oneself
Meaning_translated_KR: 몹시 화가 나다 또는 제정신을 잃다

Meaning: to suffer a large financial loss or lose all of one's money
Meaning_translated_KR: 큰 재정적 손실을 입다 또는 모든 돈을 잃다

Meaning: to lose communication or connection with someone; to be unfamiliar or out of contact with someone
Meaning_translated_KR: 누군가와의 소통이나 연결을 잃다; 누군가와 낯설거나 연락이 끊기다

Meaning: to suffer humiliation or embarrassment, often in front of others
Meaning_translated_KR: 타인 앞에서 굴욕이나 치욕을 겪다

Meaning: to become overwhelmed with emotion or panic, and lose control of one's thoughts or actions
Meaning_translated_KR: 감정이나 공포에 압도되어 자신의 생각이나 행동을 제어하지 못하다.

Meaning: To become discouraged or disheartened; to lose motivation or hope
Meaning_translated_KR: 낙담하거나 기운이 빠지다; 동기나 희망을 잃다

Meaning: to become confused or disorganized; to lose focus or clarity on a situation or story
Meaning_translated_KR: 혼란스럽거나 무질서해지다; 상황이나 이야기에서 집중력이나 명확성을 잃다

Meaning: to lose contact or communication with someone over time
Meaning_translated_KR: 시간이 지나면서 누군가와 연락이나 소통이 끊기다

Meaning: to become overwhelmed or panic in a situation
Meaning_translated_KR: 상황에서 압도되거나 패닉 상태가 되다

Meaning: to lose one's mind or sanity; to become mentally unstable
Meaning_translated_KR: 정신을 잃다; 정신적으로 불안정해지다

Meaning: to suffer a significant financial loss or to lose a large amount of money
Meaning_translated_KR: 상당한 재정적 손실을 겪다; 큰 금액의 돈을 잃다

Meaning: to become less skilled or less successful in something that one was previously skilled or successful in
Meaning_translated_KR: 이전에 능숙하거나 성공적이었던 분야에서 덜 능숙해지거나 덜 성공적이 되다.

Meaning: not understood or appreciated by someone
Meaning_translated_KR: 누군가에게 이해되지 않거나 평가되지 않는

Meaning: to fall in love with someone or something immediately upon first seeing them
Meaning_translated_KR: 어떤 사람이나 것을 처음 보고 바로 사랑에 빠지다

Meaning: a child born out of wedlock
Meaning_translated_KR: 혼외자녀

Meaning: Love does not see faults or flaws
Meaning_translated_KR: 사랑은 결점이나 흠을 보지 않는다.

Meaning: To accept and appreciate someone unconditionally, including their flaws or the things they care about
Meaning_translated_KR: 결점이나 그 사람이 중요하게 생각하는 것까지 포함하여, 조건 없이 그 사람을 받아들이고 감사하는 것

Meaning: a secluded or private place where a couple can spend time alone together, typically their home or a romantic getaway
Meaning_translated_KR: 부부가 함께 시간을 보낼 수 있는 외딴 또는 사적인 장소, 일반적으로 그들의 집이나 로맨틱한 휴양지

Meaning: someone who is unfaithful or deceitful in a romantic relationship
Meaning_translated_KR: 연애 관계에서 불충실하거나 속이는 사람

Meaning: to love someone intensely or excessively
Meaning_translated_KR: 누군가를 강렬하게 또는 지나치게 사랑하다

Meaning: To love or adore someone very much
Meaning_translated_KR: 누군가를 매우 사랑하거나 존경하다

Meaning: to love someone excessively or in a way that is suffocating or detrimental to the relationship
Meaning_translated_KR: 누군가를 지나치게 사랑하다거나 관계에 해롭거나 숨이 막힐 정도로 사랑하다

Meaning: To have strong conflicting emotions towards someone or something
Meaning_translated_KR: 누군가 또는 무언가에 대해 강한 상충되는 감정을 가지다

Meaning: to have strong conflicting feelings towards someone or something
Meaning_translated_KR: 누군가 또는 무언가에 대해 강한 상반된 감정을 가지다

Meaning: rainy or wet weather
Meaning_translated_KR: 비 오는 날씨 또는 습한 날씨

Meaning: expressing or showing exaggerated affection or sentimentality
Meaning_translated_KR: 과장된 애정이나 감정을 표현하거나 보이는 것

Meaning: something that is easily attainable or achievable, often with little effort or risk
Meaning_translated_KR: 쉽게 얻거나 성취할 수 있는 것, 종종 적은 노력이나 위험으로 이루어지는 것

Idiom: low man on the totem pole
Meaning: the person with the least authority or status in a group or organization
Meaning_translated_KR: 그룹이나 조직에서 권한이나 지위가 가장 낮은 사람

Meaning: the easiest or most accessible tasks or goals
Meaning_translated_KR: 가장 쉬운 또는 가장 접근하기 쉬운 작업이나 목표

Meaning: a person of low social status, often involved in criminal or disreputable activities
Meaning_translated_KR: 사회적 지위가 낮고 종종 범죄나 평판이 좋지 않은 활동에 연루된 사람

Meaning: to reduce one's expectations or ambitions, typically in order to be more realistic or attainable
Meaning_translated_KR: 기대나 야망을 줄이다, 일반적으로 더 현실적이거나 달성 가능한 목표를 위해

Meaning: to be angry or upset with someone
Meaning_translated_KR: 누군가에게 화가 나거나 불쾌해하다

Meaning: achieve success or reach a goal
Meaning_translated_KR: 성공을 이루다 또는 목표에 도달하다

Meaning: to be very rich or wealthy
Meaning_translated_KR: 매우 부유하다

Meaning: a type of hallucinogenic mushroom that is believed to have mystical or magical powers
Meaning_translated_KR: 신비로운 또는 마법 같은 힘을 가진 것으로 여겨지는 일종의 환각성 버섯

Meaning: exceptional ability or skill in making something successful or bringing about positive results
Meaning_translated_KR: 무언가를 성공적으로 만들거나 긍정적인 결과를 가져오는 데 있어 뛰어난 능력이나 기술

Meaning: something that can solve all problems or make things happen effortlessly
Meaning_translated_KR: 모든 문제를 해결하거나 일을 수월하게 만들어주는 것

Meaning: to cause someone to feel great desire or anticipation for something, typically food or drink
Meaning_translated_KR: 누군가가 음식이나 음료 같은 것에 대해 큰 욕망이나 기대감을 느끼게 하다

Meaning: to cause a disturbance or commotion in a public setting
Meaning_translated_KR: 공공장소에서 소란이나 소동을 일으키다

Meaning: to completely sever ties or end a relationship in a decisive and definitive manner
Meaning_translated_KR: 관계를 완전히 끊다; 단호하고 확실한 방식으로 끝내다

Meaning: to confess or make a full and honest disclosure
Meaning_translated_KR: 고백하거나 완전하고 정직하게 털어놓다

Meaning: to make money quickly and easily, often through dishonest or questionable means
Meaning_translated_KR: 빠르고 쉽게 돈을 벌다, 종종 부정직하거나 의심스러운 방법으로

Meaning: to attempt or try to succeed at something; to put in effort to make something work
Meaning_translated_KR: 무언가를 성공시키기 위해 시도하거나 노력하다; 어떤 일이 잘 되도록 힘을 쓰다

Meaning: to make a large or excessive profit; to be extremely successful or fortunate in a financial or business venture
Meaning_translated_KR: 막대한 이익을 얻다; 재정적 또는 사업적 노력에서 극히 성공하거나 운이 좋다

Meaning: to summarize or give a brief version of a story or situation
Meaning_translated_KR: 이야기나 상황을 요약하다/간략하게 설명하다

Meaning: to exaggerate or overly complicate something, especially in a way that makes it more difficult or time-consuming
Meaning_translated_KR: 무언가를 과장하거나 지나치게 복잡하게 만들어 특히 그것을 더 어렵거나 시간이 더 걸리게 하는 것

Meaning: to make someone look foolish or ridiculous
Meaning_translated_KR: 누군가를 어리석게 보이게 하거나 우스꽝스럽게 만들다

Meaning: to make a fool out of someone, to embarrass or humiliate someone
Meaning_translated_KR: 누군가를 바보처럼 만들다, 누군가를 당황하게 하거나 굴욕감을 주다

Idiom: make a mountain out of a molehill
Meaning: exaggerating or making a big deal out of something small or unimportant
Meaning_translated_KR: 사소하거나 중요하지 않은 일을 과장하거나 크게 떠벌리는 것

Meaning: take action or make a decision
Meaning_translated_KR: 행동을 취하거나 결정을 내리다

Meaning: to stay out late and have an enjoyable and eventful night
Meaning_translated_KR: 늦게까지 밖에 나가 즐겁고 다채로운 밤을 보내다

Meaning: to eat too much or in a greedy and excessive manner
Meaning_translated_KR: 폭식하다; 탐욕스럽고 과도하게 먹다

Meaning: to completely mess up or botch something
Meaning_translated_KR: 무언가를 완전히 엉망으로 만들다 or 망치다

Meaning: to make a sales presentation or proposal
Meaning_translated_KR: 판매 프레젠테이션이나 제안을 하다

Meaning: to attract attention through dramatic or disruptive behavior; to cause a public disturbance or commotion
Meaning_translated_KR: 극적이거나 파괴적인 행동으로 주목을 끌다; 공공의 소란이나 혼란을 일으키다

Meaning: To attract attention or make a noticeable impact or impression.
Meaning_translated_KR: 관심을 끌거나 눈에 띄는 영향이나 인상을 주다.

Meaning: to make the best of a difficult situation
Meaning_translated_KR: 어려운 상황에서 최선을 다하다

Meaning: to earn money in a fair and ethical manner
Meaning_translated_KR: 공정하고 윤리적인 방법으로 돈을 벌다

Meaning: to attempt to accomplish something without the necessary resources or materials
Meaning_translated_KR: 필요한 자원이나 재료 없이 무언가를 성취하려고 시도하다

Meaning: to engage in idle chatter or talk in a noisy, meaningless, or irritating way
Meaning_translated_KR: 시끄럽고 의미 없거나 짜증나는 방식으로 잡담을 하다

Meaning: to manage with what is available or to make the best of a difficult situation
Meaning_translated_KR: 주어진 상황에서 최선을 다하다 또는 어려운 상황을 잘 헤쳐 나가다

Meaning: to have enough money to cover basic expenses; to make a living or get by financially
Meaning_translated_KR: 기본적인 비용을 충당할 만큼의 돈이 있는 것; 생계를 유지하거나 재정적으로 힘겹게 살아가다

Meaning: to make the most of a situation or opportunity; to take advantage of a favorable set of circumstances
Meaning_translated_KR: 상황이나 기회를 최대한 활용하다; 유리한 상황을 이용하다

Idiom: make hay while the sun shines
Meaning: to take advantage of an opportunity while it is available
Meaning_translated_KR: 기회가 있을 때 그 기회를 활용하다

Meaning: to understand or comprehend something
Meaning_translated_KR: 무언가를 이해하거나 파악하다

Meaning: to make something more difficult or complicated than necessary
Meaning_translated_KR: 필요 이상으로 무언가를 더 어렵거나 복잡하게 만들다

Meaning: to make a task or situation more difficult, complicated, or time-consuming than necessary
Meaning_translated_KR: 작업이나 상황을 필요 이상으로 더 어렵고 복잡하게 만들거나 시간 소모가 많게 하다

Meaning: to do something that has a significant and lasting impact on a particular field or area
Meaning_translated_KR: 특정 분야나 영역에 상당하고 지속적인 영향을 미치는 일을 하다

Meaning: to achieve great success or become famous or influential
Meaning_translated_KR: 큰 성공을 거두다 또는 유명해지거나 영향력 있는 사람이 되다

Meaning: to do something quickly or without delay
Meaning_translated_KR: 신속하게 또는 지체 없이 무언가를 하다

Meaning: to treat or consider something as unimportant or insignificant
Meaning_translated_KR: 무시하다; 중요하지 않거나 사소하게 여기다

Meaning: to accomplish or complete a task quickly and easily
Meaning_translated_KR: 작업을 빠르고 쉽게 완료하다

Meaning: to prioritize love and harmony over conflict and violence
Meaning_translated_KR: 갈등과 폭력보다 사랑과 조화를 우선시하다

Meaning: To make a large amount of money quickly and easily
Meaning_translated_KR: 빠르고 쉽게 많은 돈을 벌다

Meaning: to be straightforward, honest, or open about something, without hesitation or reservation
Meaning_translated_KR: 주저하거나 망설이지 않고 무엇에 대해 솔직하고 정직하게 이야기하다

Meaning: to progress or advance, typically in a difficult or challenging situation
Meaning_translated_KR: 어려운 상황에서 발전하거나 나아가다

Meaning: to have the potential to either lead to great success or complete failure
Meaning_translated_KR: 큰 성공으로 이어지거나 완전한 실패로 이어질 잠재력을 가지다

Meaning: to be logical, reasonable, or understandable
Meaning_translated_KR: 논리적이거나 합리적이며 이해할 수 있다

Meaning: to complete something quickly and efficiently
Meaning_translated_KR: 무엇인가를 신속하고 효율적으로 완성하다

Meaning: to do something that brings joy or happiness to someone; to make someone feel special or appreciated
Meaning_translated_KR: 누군가에게 기쁨이나 행복을 주다; 누군가를 특별하게 느끼게 하거나 감사하게 하다

Meaning: to accept and deal with a difficult or unsatisfactory situation in the most positive way possible
Meaning_translated_KR: 어려운 상황이나 만족스럽지 않은 상황을 가능한 한 긍정적인 방법으로 수용하고 대처하다

Meaning: to be selected or chosen, especially in a competitive situation
Meaning_translated_KR: 선택되다 또는 고르다, 특히 경쟁적인 상황에서

Meaning: to meet the necessary requirements or standards, especially in terms of academic or professional performance
Meaning_translated_KR: 필수 요건이나 기준, 특히 학업이나 직업 성과 측면에서 충족하다

Meaning: to leave or depart quickly
Meaning_translated_KR: 빨리 떠나다

Meaning: to make a decision
Meaning_translated_KR: 결정을 내리다

Meaning: to reach a decision, to choose or decide on something
Meaning_translated_KR: 결정을 내리다, 선택하거나 무엇인가를 결정하다

Meaning: to cause trouble or disruption; to create a disturbance
Meaning_translated_KR: 문제를 일

Meaning: to cause extreme anger or frustration
Meaning_translated_KR: 극도의 분노나 좌절을 일으키다

Meaning: to feel comfortable and at ease in someone else's home; to act as if you are in your own home
Meaning_translated_KR: 다른 사람의 집에서 편안하고 안락하게 느끼다; 마치 자신의 집인 것처럼 행동하다

Meaning: to leave or disappear quickly, especially in order to avoid someone or something
Meaning_translated_KR: 특히 누군가 또는 무언가를 피하기 위해 빠르게 떠나다 또는 사라지다.

Meaning: since childhood or for a very long time; throughout one's life or career
Meaning_translated_KR: 어릴 적부터 또는 오랫동안; 일생 동안 또는 경력을 쌓는 동안

Idiom: man cannot live by bread alone
Meaning: Contrary to the popular belief that physical needs are the only requirements for survival, humans also need intellectual, emotional, and spiritual nourishment.
Meaning_translated_KR: 신체적 요구가 생존을 위한 유일한 조건이라는 대중적인 믿음과는 달리, 인간은 또한 지적, 감정적, 그리고 영적 영양을 필요로 한다.

Meaning: a dedicated space or room, typically in a house, where a man can relax and pursue his interests without interference
Meaning_translated_KR: 주로 집에 있는, 남성이 방해받지 않고 편안하게 휴식하고 자신의 관심사를 추구할 수 있는 전용 공간이나 방

Meaning: a police officer
Meaning_translated_KR: 경찰관

Meaning: an average or ordinary person, often used to refer to the general public or common people
Meaning_translated_KR: 평범한 사람, 일반 대중이나 보통 사람들을 가리킬 때 자주 사용됨

Meaning: a religious or spiritual leader, someone who is deeply devoted to their faith or religious beliefs
Meaning_translated_KR: 종교적 또는 영적인 지도者, 자신의 신앙이나 종교적 신념에 깊이 헌신하는 사람

Meaning: someone who keeps their promises or is trustworthy
Meaning_translated_KR: 약속을 지키거나 믿을 수 있는 사람

Meaning: someone who is wealthy or has the resources to achieve their goals
Meaning_translated_KR: 부유하거나 목표를 달성할 수 있는 자원을 가진 사람

Meaning: a person or entity that appears strong or powerful, but is actually weak or ineffective
Meaning_translated_KR: 겉으로는 강력하거나 힘이 있어 보이지만 실제로는 약하거나 효과적이지 않은 사람 또는 단체

Meaning: a clergyman or priest
Meaning_translated_KR: 성직자 또는 사제

Meaning: a dog, as dogs are often considered to be loyal and trustworthy companions to humans
Meaning_translated_KR: 개, 개는 종종 인간에게 충성스럽고 믿을 수 있는 동반자로 여겨진다.

Meaning: to emphasize the belief that a person's home is their own private space and they have control over it
Meaning_translated_KR: 개인의 집은 그 사람의 사적인 공간이며, 그에 대한 통제권이 있다는 신념을 강조하다

Meaning: used as a greeting to wish someone a happy birthday or to express goodwill on any celebratory occasion
Meaning_translated_KR: 생일 축하 또는 축하하는 경우에 누군가에게 행복을 기원하기 위해 사용하는 인사말

Meaning: a long time ago
Meaning_translated_KR: 오래전

Meaning: referring to a dog as a faithful and reliable companion to humans
Meaning_translated_KR: 개를 인간에게 충실하고 믿을 수 있는 동반자로 언급하다

Meaning: orders or instructions to leave or depart from a place or situation
Meaning_translated_KR: 곳이나 상황에서 떠나거나 출발하라는 명령이나 지시

Meaning: to pay close attention and remember what I am saying because I am confident that it will happen or be true
Meaning_translated_KR: 내가 말하는 것에 주의 깊게 귀 기울이고 기억해 줘, 왜냐하면 나는 그것이 이루어질 것이고 사실이 될 것이라고 확신하니까.

Meaning: to warn or inform someone about someone else's true character or intentions
Meaning_translated_KR: 다른 사람의 진짜 성격이나 의도에 대해 누군가에게 경고하거나 알리다

Meaning: to stay in the same place or situation without making progress; to waste time or not achieve anything significant
Meaning_translated_KR: 제자리 걸음하다; 시간을 낭비하거나 중요한 성과를 내지 않다

Meaning: someone who is in danger or under threat
Meaning_translated_KR: 위험에 처한 사람 또는 위협받고 있는 사람

Meaning: a marriage entered into for practical reasons, such as financial or political gain, rather than for love or personal compatibility
Meaning_translated_KR: 사랑이나 개인적인 호환성보다는 재정적 또는 정치적 이익과 같은 실용적인 이유로 맺어진 결혼

Idiom: marry in haste, repent at leisure
Meaning: to make a hasty decision or commitment, especially marriage, and later regret or suffer the consequences
Meaning_translated_KR: 성급한 결정을 내리거나 약속을 하다, 특히 결혼에 대해, 그리고 나중에 후회하거나 그 결과를 겪다

Meaning: to marry someone who is wealthy or has a lot of money; to marry for financial gain
Meaning_translated_KR: 부유한 사람과 결혼하다; 재정적 이익을 위해 결혼하다

Meaning: an ideal pairing or union

Meaning: discounted or reduced prices offered to friends or acquaintances, often lower than the prices offered to the general public

Meaning: something that is bound to happen eventually; only a question of when it will happen
Meaning_translated_KR: 결국 반드시 일어날 것; 언제 일어날지만 문제일 뿐이다.

Meaning: an acknowledgement or admission of one's own error or fault

Meaning: To be serious and determined about something

Meaning: something that is done in order to achieve a particular result or goal, although it may not be enjoyable or ethical

Meaning: the essential or most important parts of something; the basic or fundamental aspects

Meaning: "meat and two veg" is a vulgar slang phrase that refers to a traditional British meal consisting of a main course of meat with two accompanying vegetables. However, it is often used as a euphemism to refer to male genitalia.
Meaning_translated_KR: "meat and two veg"는 전통적인 영국식 식사로, 고기와 두 가지 채소로 구성된 메인 코스를 가리키는 욕설 속어입니다. 그러나 종종 남성 생식기를 가리키는 완곡어로 사용되기도 합니다.

Meaning: a place or destination that is highly revered or sought after by someone or something
Meaning_translated_KR: 누군가 또는 어떤 것에 의해 매우 존경받거나 추구되는 장소 또는 목적지

Meaning: to meet one's match or downfall; to face a significant defeat or failure
Meaning_translated_KR: 상대를 만나다; 의미 있는 패배나 실패를 겪다

Meaning: to die

Meaning: to compromise; to make an effort to reach a mutually satisfactory agreement

Meaning: to experience a devastating defeat or failure

Meaning: to die or encounter death

Meaning: To find someone who is just as skilled or capable as oneself, often resulting in a challenging or evenly matched competition or confrontation.

Meaning: relaxed, calm, and easygoing

Meaning: having a poor or unreliable memory

Meaning: business professionals or corporate executives, often associated with formality or bureaucracy
Meaning_translated_KR: 비즈니스 전문가 또는 기업 경영진, 종종 형식성이나 관료제와 관련되어 있는 사람들

Idiom: men make houses, women make homes

Meaning: to repair or improve a damaged or strained relationship; to reconcile or make peace

Meaning: an unconventional or seemingly illogical approach or plan that actually has a hidden purpose or systematic logic

Meaning: to have a moderate or centrist stance, or to avoid extreme views or positions

Idiom: miles to go before I sleep

Meaning: to use the power of one's mind to overcome physical challenges or difficulties

Meaning: Be careful about what you say or how you speak

Meaning: to not interfere in someone else's affairs

Meaning: to make a lot of money quickly or easily

Meaning: to make a lot of money quickly and easily
Meaning_translated_KR: 빠르고 쉽게 많은 돈을 벌다

Meaning: the tendency for unhappy or miserable people to seek out others who are also unhappy or miserable, often as a way to validate their own feelings or experiences
Meaning_translated_KR: 불행하거나 고통스러운 사람들이 자신의 감정이나 경험을 정당화하기 위한 방법으로 비슷한 감정을 가진 다른 사람들을 찾는 경향

Meaning: to miss an opportunity

Meaning: to miss an opportunity or to be too late to take advantage of something

Meaning: brief period of fame, recognition, or success

Meaning: money is not easily obtained or readily available

Meaning: a profitable or financially successful venture

Meaning: foolish or mischievous behavior

Meaning: Doing something quickly and without care often results in mistakes or delays, so it is better to take one's time and be thorough.

Meaning: unfortunately; it is a shame; it is regrettable

Meaning: to do everything possible or go to great lengths in order to achieve or accomplish something
Meaning_translated_KR: 무언가를 이루거나 성취하기 위해 가능한 모든 것을 하다; 모든 노력을 기울이다

Meaning: to do something extraordinary or achieve something seemingly impossible

Meaning: a woman who is responsible for cleaning and tidying up

Meaning: very similar or nearly identical

Meaning: to think deeply or carefully about something

Meaning: to keep something a secret or to not speak about it

Meaning: something that is pleasing or gratifying to hear; good news or information that brings joy or relief

Meaning: something that is very pleasing or satisfying to someone

Meaning: refers to an older woman who is dressed in a style more suitable for a younger woman, usually implying that she is trying too hard to appear younger or more attractive than she actually is
Meaning_translated_KR: 상대적으로 젊은 여성에게 더 적합한 스타일로 옷을 입은 나이 많은 여성을 가리키며, 일반적으로 그녀가 실제보다 더 젊어 보이거나 매력적으로 보이기 위해 지나치게 노력하고 있다는 것을 암시합니다.

Meaning: acknowledging one's mistake or accepting responsibility for something that went wrong
Meaning_translated_KR: 자신의 실수를 인정하거나 잘못된 일에 대한 책임을 받아들이다.

Meaning: used to express disbelief or to indicate that something is completely untrue or ridiculous
Meaning_translated_KR: 믿을 수 없거나 무언가가 완전히 사실이 아니거나 터무니없다는 것을 나타내기 위해 사용됨

Meaning: I have a strong intuition or feeling about something

Meaning: a term of endearment or affection, often used to refer to a close friend or loved one

Meaning: slang for 'my dear friend' or 'my mate'

Meaning: offering one's opinion or advice on a subject, often unsolicited

Meaning: an uncompromising attitude or approach, typically with little or no regard for others' opinions or preferences
Meaning_translated_KR: 타인의 의견이나 선호를 거의 고려하지 않거나 전혀 고려하지 않는 대단히 비타협적인 태도나 접근 방식

Meaning: to successfully accomplish or achieve something

Meaning: to celebrate or honor the named person on a specific day each year

Meaning: to identify specific individuals or provide specific information or details about something

Meaning: to set a date for a wedding or other significant event

Meaning: empty or unused spaces are unnatural and will always be filled or occupied by something

Meaning: to have the urge to use the bathroom

Meaning: to be close to being offensive or crossing a social boundary

Meaning: something that is unpleasant but required or necessary

Idiom: necessity is the mother of invention

Meaning: when a desperate situation arises, people will do whatever is necessary, regardless of any rules or laws

Meaning: very close or even in a competition or race; with no clear leader
Meaning_translated_KR: 경쟁이나 경주에서 매우 근접한 상태; 명확한 우승자가 없는 상태

Meaning: a particular neighborhood or region; a specific area or vicinity

Meaning: something or someone that does not belong to any specific group or category

Meaning: not relevant or important; of no consequence

Meaning: a person who is easily anxious or worried

Meaning: something unexpected or beyond what one could have imagined or anticipated

Meaning: to disregard or dismiss; to not pay attention or give importance to something

Meaning: to have a determined and never-give-up attitude, even in the face of challenges or setbacks
Meaning_translated_KR: 어려움이나 좌절에도 불구하고 결단력 있고 포기하지 않는 태도를 가지다

Meaning: Two things or groups are so different that they cannot coexist or come together

Meaning: do not worry or be concerned about it; I will handle it or take care of it myself

Meaning: a place or situation that is fanciful, unrealistic, or impossible to achieve or sustain

Meaning: An extremely short amount of time or moment; something that happens very quickly.

Meaning: someone who has recently arrived or joined a group or organization

Meaning: someone who is new to a particular place or situation

Meaning: someone who is new to a particular area or group, often implying that they are inexperienced or unknown
Meaning_translated_KR: 특정한 지역이나 그룹에 새로 온 사람, 종종 그들이 경험이 부족하거나 알려지지 않았음을 암시하는 표현

Meaning: closest living relative
Meaning_translated_KR: 가장 가까운 살아있는 친척

Meaning: almost nothing; a very small amount

Meaning: to be very pleasant, kind, or polite
Meaning_translated_KR: 매우 쾌적하거나, 친절하거나, 공손하다

Meaning: completely different or completely opposite

Meaning: someone who stays up late at night or is most active during the evening hours

Meaning: almost always or in the majority of cases

Meaning: to work a typical full-time schedule, usually from 9 AM to 5 PM
Meaning_translated_KR: 전형적인 풀타임 스케줄로 일하다, 보통 오전 9시부터 오후 5시까지

Meaning: an extremely close or closely contested competition or race

Meaning: the most important or basic aspects or details of a situation

Meaning: an area or situation that is unclaimed, vague, or undefined, often representing a dangerous or uncertain space

Meaning: an abundance of; a large amount of

Meaning: occupying someone's thoughts or preoccupying someone

Meaning: feeling anxious or nervous, especially while waiting for something uncertain or important to happen

Meaning: to be put aside or delayed, often in favor of more urgent or important matters

Meaning: "as a result of" or "because of"

Meaning: to be alert, attentive, and quick to respond or react

Meaning: not functioning properly; experiencing a temporary malfunction

Meaning: to be experiencing a series of successes or positive outcomes

Meaning: about to happen; on the verge of

Meaning: at exactly the right time or in exactly the right way

Meaning: likely to happen or be true; probable

Meaning: being reprimanded or called to account for something

Meaning: actively investigating or working on a situation or problem

Idiom: on the crest of a wave
Meaning: experiencing a period of great success or happiness
